1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ dI kra ma tat+t+wa b+hA ba sa nA ma mu Sh+Ti 
1b2(rgyud 'grel): sad+d+ha n+ya/ bod skad du/ rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid sgom pa 
1b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i zhal gyi lung / thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal 
1b4(rgyud 'grel): lo// dpal ldan pa de rdzogs zab gsal gnyis med 'od zer 
1b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan// de yi rang bzhin zhi ba bcu drug byed cha 'bar// don dam 
2a1(rgyud 'grel): snying po do ston bla ma gsum po rab// de la bya byed gsum mnyam pa yis rtag du 
2a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dud// 'jig rten gsum gyi sgron ma kun gyis rab bsngags pa// chos rnams kun gyi snying po 
2a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos po'i de bzhin nyid// srid pa'i dug chu zlog byed gsum khong dam sbeng 'bar// 'jam dbyangs 
2a4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i lung gis rtogs phyir bshad par bya// dbus kyi yul chen kha bir grong khyer rdo 'jog tu/ 
2a5(rgyud 'grel): bzang po seng ge zhes byar grags pa rab thob pa// bla ma de ni mnyes byas lung thob gzhung mang thos/ 
2a6(rgyud 'grel): de la rnam dpyad rig 'byung shrIn lAn+dar// yon tan bshes gnyen zhes bya rigs can de yi ngor/ 
2b1(rgyud 'grel): blun bros rab tu byed pa phyogs 'ga' rtsom byed pa'i// thod pas der gnas rnams la gzhung des phan gdags par// bsams nas der gnas rtsom dang ston sogs rab tu bya// de nas yon tan kun 'byung u rgyan 
2b2(rgyud 'grel): yul du bgrod// 'jo sgeg rdo rje zhes byar mtshan gsol rab tu grags// de la mang thos rnam par dpyad cing de nyid du// gu ne ru grags bla ma de yang mnyes byas te// lung thob gnas de'i byang phyogs chab sgo bdag 
2b3(rgyud 'grel): dza thig dzal zhes bya'i bu mo bcu drug pa// laN+DI chen mo mnyes byas zla ba brgyad kyi bar// de yi lung ni rab thob gnon gnas grub pa thob// de nas dza lAn+d+ha ra nga grong khyer ko no dzar// phyin nas 'ba' mo pa ta zhes byar grags pa 
2b4(rgyud 'grel): rab thob gang // mnyes byas gzhung thos lung na mang du thos gyur nas// lho phyogs nam mkha'i shing ldan gong kan du bgrod// grub pa'i dbang phyug pa li pa tang rab grags pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i slob ma'i tshogs dang rab 
2b5(rgyud 'grel): tu bcas// de kun yo byad gos zas nor rgyun gyis sbyor ba// tha ma dam pa de drung lo dgu rab tu 'dud// 'dus pa'i rgyud chen 'grel bcas bco brgyad rab tu mnyan// bdag gis ma rtogs bla ma chen pos de bzhin gsungs 
2b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ma rtogs par gzhan ni don med par bsams nas// glegs bam mgul btags byang phyogs yul du rab bgrod de// rdo rje gdan rgyab ku ba tsa zhes bya ba'i tshal// stag dang dred sogs mang zhing shin tu 'jigs 
2b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sar// zla ba drug gnas pa yi chos rnams de nyid rtogs// sprul pa'i dge slong bla ma gnyis dang bcas dang phrad// mgo dang lag gnyis yol dang tshes brgyad rgyal la bab// ston zlar ba'i tho rangs skya rengs shar dus su// 
2b8(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo sprul pa la// bdag gis don 'di blang phyir gsol ba rab tu gdab// khyod ni sems can kun gyi yab ste yum yang yin// khyod kyis bdag la sogs te 'jigs pa che las 
3a1(rgyud 'grel): stobs// 'gro ba'i dbang po rje btsun khyod kyis sdug bsngal sel// khams gsum stong byed chab che khyod skye bo slongs// thog ma med khyod nga ro thigs pa'i steng cha med// rje btsun yig med bdud rtsi 
3a2(rgyud 'grel): rab dga' ba de gtong byed// 'grol phan phyir bde bas sangs rgyas rnams kun la// rabang gyes bde ba'i mgon chen khyod kyis gtong bar mdzod// skyon gyis mgos bla na med pa'i byang chub lam// sna tshogs/ 
3a3(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal ni mdzad sdom pa ngoms mdzad cing // 'khor ba rba klong thar mdzad bde la 'god mdzad pa// dngos kun rgyal bas mi dpogs lam 'di bstan par mdzod// zhi ba'i zhi ba rdul dang rab bral 'jungs pa 
3a4(rgyud 'grel): spangs// bsgom pa las 'das mkha' 'dra dri mas mgos pa// sku mthun 'das 'dod pa kun la rgyab kyis phrogs// de 'tha'i rje btsun khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// dregs med 'jigs med byang chub chen po 
3a5(rgyud 'grel): thob kyi bar// 'khor bar 'tsho bar 'jig rten dmyal rtsub ma ltung bar// khyod gsungs dam chog sdom pa thun mong ma yin rnams// bdag la sogs pas rtag tu rab tu bskyang bar bgyi// gar chen rnam par rol pas 
3a6(rgyud 'grel): gar mdzad cing // sna tshogs phyag ni bcu dang bsgrims pa yis// pad+ma lo ma 'jam pa brgyad phyenas// gnyis med bde rgyu rdo rje bzhag par mdzod// gsang ba'i de nyid mi nyams gsal bar 'gyur// rdo rje 'dab skyes 
3a7(rgyud 'grel): Sh+ma hU~M yang dag 'du// thabs shes las byung chos kun de nyid mchog/ rje btsun bdag la phan phyir sbas pa shod// de nas 'jam dbyangs byang chub sems dpa' chen po yis// bdag la 'dzum pa'i bzhin 
3a8(rgyud 'grel): bltas legs zhes lan gsum gsungs// rol pa'i gar dang chos kun de bzhin nyid// sra brnyan sna bung rdo rje ga yis bdag la bstan// a bi ya ba la thAM/ al lal to// rje btsun thugs rje che rnams kyis/ 
3b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di rtogs pa yis bde gshegs kyi// phun sum tshogs pa 'thob 'gyur ba'i// 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i// rdo rje 'dzin pas snod 'ga' la// gsungs shing gsung dang gsung 'gyur ba// yang dag 
3b2(rgyud 'grel): don rab rab rtogs phyir// nga yis khyod la bstan par bya// yid gcig bsdus la mnyan par gyis// chos rnams gzugs la sogs pa rnams// kun mkhyen par gyi rang bzhin ni// nam mkha'i dkyil 
3b3(rgyud 'grel): ltar rnam dag pa'i// zab gsal gnyis med ye shes te// de ni dngos med bsgom dngos med// dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'i// khams dang skye mched kyis mazin// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba/ 
3b4(rgyud 'grel): gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin// med pas chos rnams mtshan nyid spangs// chos dang chos nyid yang med de// dngos po med pas mkha' dang mtshungs// tshig dang yi ge kun las grol// de ni dus dang phyogs 
3b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang // chos kun gyi ni bor song // lus ma yin te ga dang ni// yid kyang ma yin 'dod khams dang // gzugs dang gzugs med khams ma yin// 'byung chen ba ni yang ma yin te// de bas de ni ga 
3b6(rgyud 'grel): nayang // mi gnas pas na mnyam pa nyid// de 'dra rdo rje 'chang chen po// chos rnams kun gyi chos nyid mchog/ thabs kyis bslab par bya ba'i dngos// brtags pa kun las rab dben pa// phun sum 
3b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rgya dpag dka' ba// phyag rgya chen por rab snang ba'i// zer gyis rang nyid sbyin byed pa// de gnyis med pa'i rang bzhin mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos kyang // brjod du med pa'i sku chen po// de nyid 
3b8(rgyud 'grel): man sa dang // sengs sa na mas das // dal na ya masas// ngas dang mas rgya tha# 
4a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum yang de nyid do// 'byung chen rnams kyang de nyid do// ci yi phyir na chos thams cad// sems la gnas te de nyid kyang // nam mkha' la gnas nam mkha' 
4a2(rgyud 'grel): ni// gang du mi gnas 'od gsal ba// gzod nas rnam dag stong pa'o// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa'i khams// skye med rdo rje mngon byang chub// bder gshegs kun gyi snying po mchog/ gnyis 
4a3(rgyud 'grel): med rtog bral don chen te// rim pa gnyis par rab tu bshad// de 'dra'i don des dngos po kun// rnam par khyab te rnam gnas kyang // thog med dus nas de las kyang // rnam rtog chen po tshul byung 
4a4(rgyud 'grel): ste// de la yang ni 'byung ba che// rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid byung ste// de las kyang ni me yi khams// chen po byung nas khyab mdzad de// de las chu khams chen po yang // byung ste khyab mdzad de las kyang // 
4a5(rgyud 'grel): sa byung bzhi bsdus ngo bo las// ri sogs sems can thams cad kyang // sna tshogs phra ba sbom po dang // skyes pa bud med ma ning dang // gzhon nu dang ni rgan po dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // gdon 
4a6(rgyud 'grel): dang skar ma gshin rje dang // chub dag brgya byin dmyal ba dang // yid dgas dud 'gro dang de kun// spangs dang shes tsam rab brten pa'i// 'gro ba kun tu rgyas par gnas// de bas de yi gong ma yi// gnyis 
4a7(rgyud 'grel): med rtog bral rab bsgribs te// ma rtogs pas na 'gro ba kun// 'khor bar rab tu 'khor bar 'gyur// de ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal che// dug chu lta bu 'khrul pa yis// rnam pasgrubs thag pa'i sprul lha/ 
4b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dun pa// sems kyi smon lam yang dag can// sngon du bsod nams mthu ba skyed dang // skyes bu yang dag bzhi la brten// spro dang gus dang bsnyen bkur dang // 'dun par ldan zhing sgom pa 
4b2(rgyud 'grel): dang // brtan po som nyi rnam spangs pa// rjes mthun gtong phod des shes 'gyur// de yis rje btsun yang dag pa// mchog gi gdam ngag rgyud la ldan// theg chen lam gyi spyod pa dang // bsgom pa la ni 
4b3(rgyud 'grel): lhur len dang // de nyid bcu la sogs pa yi// gsang dang rab gsang shin du gsang // shes shing de yi don gab par// ston byed bla ma mnyes par bya// yul dang mkhar dang khyim dang rta// glang po che sogs
4b4(rgyud 'grel): mal stan dang // chung ma sdug dang yid 'ong bu// bu mo sring mo cha mo sogs// gzhan yang gser dang dngul gyi rdzas// zangs lcags sogs las byas pa yi// mdzes pa'i rdzas dang mu tig gi/ phreng dang pad+ma rA ga 
4b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // pu shwar in+d+ra nI la dang // mar gad g.yu sogs mchod pa'i tshogs// zhing 'di mkhas pas rab bkang ste// de 'dra'i rje btsun dbang po mchod// gsal zhing rab dga' mkha' mnyam pa// gzhan du rig par 
4b6(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur bas// bud med sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ni// sgyu ma kun las khyad par 'phags// sgyu ma de yang 'jig rten 'dir// spyan la sogs par rnam dag pas// rigs ni rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te// ming dang mtshan nyid bshad 
4b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya// ka ma li dang shang ki ni// tsi tra ni dang ha sta ni// dang po klu mo rigs yin te// gnyis pa stag dang seng+ge'i rigs// gsum pa ri dgas kriSh+Ta tshogs// bzhi pa glang po che rigs so// de la ka ma li yi ni// 
4b8(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs dang mtshan nyid bstan par bya// bu mo pad+ma'i dri bro zhing // ngo thum sna rtse til 'dra ste// se mo dmar zhing rgyab skur dang // rkang mthil kun gyis sa la reg/ ba spu 'khyil ldan se mo can// dkar 'chang til gyi/ 
5a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu 'dra// gsus pa'i gnyer ma gsum ldan zhing // brang mdzes glang chen ltar 'gros dang // rAk+ta'i ro ni skur ba'o// sha mdog dmar te lha mo 'di// mA ma kI yis rnam par 
5a2(rgyud 'grel): dag/ shang ki ni yi mtshan nyid dang // dbyibs ni khyod la bstan par bya// bu mo ba ts+tshi dri bro zhing // sman ring zhing sA yang ring // dkar 'chang na rag 'dra ba// 'o ma zhol rab tu sred// rAk+ta'i ron mang 
5a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// mdog ni dkar ser gnas pa yi// gos dkar mo yis rnam par dag/ de bzhin ci tra ni yi ni// dbyibs deng mtshan nyid bshad par bya// bu mo sha rlon dri bro zhing // lus chung brla ni shin tu mdzes// 
5a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar 'chang shing thog pa la 'dra// ngo tsha med cing khro 'dod pa// rtag tu 'thab mo dag la dga'// rje ngar bya rog dang 'dra zhing // mchu 'phyang gan rgyal du nyal ba// phug ron skad 'dra sha mdog ni// sngobasangs 
5a5(rgyud 'grel): rASh+Ta'i ro tsha ba'o// de ni lha mo sgrol mas dag/ ha sti ni yi mtshan nyid dang / dbyibs ni nga yis bstan par bya// bu mo chang gi dri bro zhing // byin sbom sa ni cung zad yo// dring zhing ni lus sbom dang // spyod pa cing 
5a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing mdog rdul skya// dkar 'chang g.yas g.yon du dbye ba// sha mdog sdug cing rAk+ta ro// bsngal zhing de 'dra'i bu mo ni// sangs rgyas spyan mas dag pa'o// da ni de dag thams cad kyi// rung dang mi rung 
5a7(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa bstan// rol tshe rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang // khong du dga' zhing tshig mang dang // bsgo ba bzhin du bka' yang gcog/ 'o byas kha ni 'phyi byed de// bla ma'i yon tan shes 'gyur yang // gzhan du de la rung 
5a8(rgyud 'grel): bad bsad// tha ma ma mthong ltar byed cing // 'ongs kyang de la phyag mi 'tshal// rje brgyan de dang mi mthun pa'i// me gzhan dang ni rtse dga' byed// de sogs rab tu mi rung ste// mkhas pas rab tu spang bar 
5b1(rgyud 'grel): bya// rung ba 'di ni mkhas pas btsal// mig gi rtsa mdangs mig rtsa rgod// slar zhing skad cig bsam pa dang // skad cig rgod pa'i 'phro bzhag nas// bsam zhing yang na smra 'am 'dzum// rje btsun tha ma 
5b2(rgyud 'grel): mthong gyur na// dga' zhing mdzes lnga 'dzum par byed// de yi bka' stsal nyan ning mos// steg pa'i tshul gyis zhesar ldan// gzhan du de la snyan par brjod// de mthong 'grogs la 'khyud cing bstan/ 
5b3(rgyud 'grel): phag du 'khri zhing sor tshig nyed// sma ni bkrol nas slar 'ching byed// gos 'chos shing ni bar bar 'dzum// tha ma ma mthong ltar byed cing // gos 'chos pa dang lus nyid dang // rkang pas sa la 'dud cing 
5b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bri// bus pa'i khal 'byed cing // nam son cing gi dgas 'grol// rngabastan mas ma mdzadza// thang dbyangs yin cing mthang bar byed// de ni gang na gnas pa dang // don med bskad kyis 
5b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // drag thug da mos rab stegs te// lu zhing skal ba lar byed cing // mamo 'di yang bstan par byed// da ni gsang gnas dbyibs kyis ni// mtshan nyid drung dang mi rung ba// nga yis yang dag 
5b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan par b+ha// yid gcig bsdus la mnyan par gyis// gyo mo lta bu la smra dang // zung ring shin tum sug dang // rtag tugam por gnas pa dang // rtag tu zil pa 'dzag pa dang // sbal ba'i rgyab 
5b7(rgyud 'grel): lhur rtsub pa yi// gnas ni smang bya mi rung ngo // dus sbal rgyab ltar 'phang mtho nang // steng mnyam shin tu 'jam po dang // ba lang gi ni lhag pa ltar// steng mnyam thog gi dbyibs kyang ring // pad+ma'aM 
5b8(rgyud 'grel): srung po bzhin du tham// rlung zhig 'dzag min chung zad 'byung // su kyang chud ma'i phyag rgyan// mkhas pas thabs kyis shin tu btsal// mtshan nyid dadang mi ldan yang // rigs dang gzugs da 
6a1(rgyud 'grel): lang tshor ldan// rgyan mdzes yid 'ong bu mo ni// longs spyod gsum ldan gzung bar bya// chos zab la mos sems dang ni// las 'brel gyis 'khyud ma byas dang // sngon gsungs grogs kyis shes 
6a2(rgyud 'grel): bslus pa'i// mi mo yang ni mkhas pas bsgrubs// de ltar de sogs bud med kyi// sgyu ma'i phyag rgya chen pos ni// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba'i// lhag pa'i lha zhes bya ba bsgrub// de yang thun mong dang bcas pa// 
6a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi mchod pa yang byas te// gong gsungs bu mo btsal nas kyang // bla ma la ni dbul bar bya// de nas bla ma de mnyes nas// de dang snyoms par zhugs pa yis// bde gshegs zhu gyur bcu drug char// gyur pa slob 
6a4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i kha ru lhung // ltung bas snying gi pad+mar zhugs// de yis zhing ni dag byas te// tshes kun sgyu ma la sogs pa'i// bcu gnyis don du rtogs par 'gyur// de las de la rang 'byung gi/ chos sku rab dga' mkha' mnyam pa// 
6a5(rgyud 'grel): lhag pa'i lha zhes bya ba ni// rtog bya'i ched du bu mo byin// lha mo 'di ni khyod dang mthun// sems chen khyod kyis 'dod pa gyis// yid 'ong bu mo 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis spyod du snang // dkyil 'khor 'khor lo cho ga 
6a6(rgyud 'grel): yis// bu mo sgrol byed dga' byin ma// byang chub chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir// khyod kyis bde chen myong bar gyis// gzhan gyis sangs rgyas mi nus pa// bu mo 'di ni yang dag mchog/ de bas mtha' med 'khor ba'i bar/ 
6a7(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis 'di dang bral mi bya// de nas sems chen de yis ni// yid 'ong bu mo blangs byas te// de yis dam tshig sdom pa'i mchog/ tshig 'dis rab tu smra bar bya// spros shig bu khyod rdo rje can// sha khrag khu ba la 
6a8(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa// dri chen dri chu sogs za'am// b+ha ga'o byed mi rtog gam// gzugs ma ngal khyod thod dam// de yis bzhad gad dang ldan par// kye/ lha mo ci phyir bdag me thod// dri chen dri chu sogs za'o// 
6b1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo khyod la bkur sti dgos// b+ha ga 'o byed nga mi rtog/ de nas bu mos ga zha phud// pad+ma gsal bstan tshig 'dis bstod// e ma ho bdag gi pad+ma 'di// bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa// cho ga'i rim pa gang
6b2(rgyud 'grel): gis spyad// de yi mdun na rtag tu gnas// don byed pad+ma dam pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyis bkur ba'i gnas// rang 'byung bde ba chen po ni// 'di na rtag par bzhugs pa yin// b+haM dza mok+Sha ho// de nas
6b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sa bon las// 'od zer stug pos nang gsal nas// lha yi 'khor lo chags byas nas// rdo rje nang nas phyir byung ste// pad+ma'i nang du zhugs byas nas// rig ma'i lha yi 'khor lo rnams// chags pa chen po bskyed 
6b4(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang // zhal nas zhal zhugs 'khor lo rnams// chags chen bskyed nas rdo rjer phyung // sngon bzhin zhugs sogs rab byas pas// yang nas yang du lha dkyil 'khor// yid kyis shin tu chags par bya/ 
6b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'dod pa'i sgyu ma'i tshig/ brjod pas bu mo chags par bya// gnyis su med pa bde ba chen po mchog/ lha mo khyod ni sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ste// zhal bzang khyod ni nga dang lhan cig tu// rnam par rtsen pas mkha' 'dra myong 
6b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// des kyang sgyu ma lta bu yi// 'dod pa'i tshig gis gsol btab nas// bdag nyid chags pa chen po yang // bskyed nas rtsa yi 'khor lo btsal// bde mchog rgya chen bdag la dgongs su gsol// bsam mi khyab 
6b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bde chen dag dang ldan// mi g.yo tshig dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan pas// bdag la khyod kyis rol cig bzhes su gsol// ngo mtshar che ba'i rol pas snang mdzad cing // byang chub snying por 'gro ba'i lam mchog 
6b8(rgyud 'grel): 'di// rgyud rnams yang dag gang la mi brten pas// bde chen yid 'ong nga yis grol bar gyis// ho ha ho// rol cig rol cig bdag la rol// 'dod pa gyis shig dga' gsal ba// khyod kyis gzhan du mi rtogs pa/ 
7a1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pas the tshom ma byed cig/ a la la la ho// de nas rab tu chags ldan pas// de dang lhan cig lus kyi ni// spyod pas dben pa'i gnas su spyad// rol pas dga' 
7a2(rgyud 'grel): ba brtag par bya// dang por 'dus ma byas nas su// de nas gru mo mtshan nyid dang // yang ni bskyang bar bya ba dang // de bzhin yar bteg mtshan nyid dang // shin tu bskyang bas lnga ru 'gyur// 
7a3(rgyud 'grel): dpung pa rab tu bskyang byas nas// gru ma mdud pas mgul nas 'khyud// bcing bas dam 'khyud g.yas g.yon skra// mgo ni mi g.yo bzung nas blta// de nas brla gnyis par bltas te// bung ba lta 
7a4(rgyud 'grel): bu sid sgra'i glu// blangs nas mchu yis rtse bar bya// 'gying bag stabs kyis 'khyud nas ni// g.yon gyis spyi bo skra bzung ste// g.yas kyis lkog ma brten nas kyang // ma mchu sbrang rtsi bzhib par bya// 
7a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ba cing srid sba brjod nas kyang // nu ma lag rtse mgrin pa dang // ma mchu 'gram pa rna ba'i rtsa// mig dang spyi bo gsang bar yang // kha yis 'o bya brtse bar yang // rna ba gnyis dang mtshan khung dang // mgrin pa 
7a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang sum mdo rnams// sen mo re mos gtab par bya// nu ma gnyis dang mtshan khung gnyis// gtso gnyis dang ni 'gram pa gnyis// lag mthil gnyis dang rkang mthil gnyis// mnyes pas
7a7(rgyud 'grel): mdza' ba chen po 'grub// g.yon gyis pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ni// mnye zhing lce yis bskyod par bya// steng 'og tu'ang blta byas nas// sems kyis de la chags par bya// de nas dga' ba'i bu mo des// 
7a8(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma bstan nas 'di skad smra// rang 'byung bde chen rgyal po ni// pad+ma 'di na rab tu gnas// rtsa dang rlung gis rtogs 'gyur bas// khyod kyis rtsa yi 'khor lo tshal// de nas de yi sor ma yis// nang nas 
7b1(rgyud 'grel): yi 'khor lo che// pad+ma la gnas snying po lngas// brgyan byas ze 'bru ge sar dang // 'dab ma brgyad pa gsal byas nas// A li kA li man+ta dang // kun ma ka dang shang sha ka/ nA li gsum po btsal bar bya// 
7b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug rtsa// gzung 'dzin bral ba b+ha ga'i dbus// bla ma'i man ngag stobs kyis ni// sor mos go bar bya dgos so// de nas bcu dang ldan pa yi// lha mo de la 'khyud par bya// rdo rje 
7b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+mar reg pa ni// bsnyen pa'i de nyid yin par bshad// rdo rje pad+mar zhugs pa ni// nye bar sgrub pa'i de nyid do// de nas bskul zhing bskyod tsam gyis// snying ni 'dar zhing dran pa nyams// spyi bor skra 'grol 
7b4(rgyud 'grel): gos kyang 'dor bar byed// rdul gyis lus khyab mdog dmar te// mig dmar phra bas bdag la blta// yang du bskul bas sgrub pa'o// de bas sems khral med pa ru// sdom brtson gzhu dbyibs 
7b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba yis// sum mdo ye shes ma sbar nas// khams bzhus nas ni bcu drug char// gyur pa me tog ku da 'dra// rlung gi sbyor bas phul bar bya// rang bzhin gyis ni rab zhi pa// chos kun zhi ba 
7b6(rgyud 'grel): de kho na// bde ba de nyid nor bur 'dug/ skad cig dran med g.yo bar byed// sgrub pa chen po de nyid do// nam mkha'i khams dang rdo rje sbyor ba las ni yang dag spyan can bde chen 'byung bar 'gyur// gang gang 
7b7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag dga' byed chags bral dga' gnyis par du bden gnyis mthong byas brtan par gyis// pad+ma mkha' la rdo rje nor bu pad snying gnyis la 'byor dang rdo rje skyil krung sems// nor bu bar du mthong byas
7b8(rgyud 'grel): gang de bde ba 'byung ba nges par de nyid ye shes te// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin par tha ma mchog rnams kun gyis yang dag bshad// 'dod chags chags bral bar ma ma dmigs ye shes lha ni skad cig deru 
8a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal// chu tshod brgyad dam nyin gcig zla ba gcig tu 'am// lo gcig bskal pa 'am bskal pa stong du ye shes de myong bya// pad+ma la gnas bdud rtsi khu ba blo gros can gyis kha 
8a2(rgyud 'grel): yis blangs nas btung bya'o// de 'dra'i dngos po thams cad kyi// mtha' yi de nyid zab gsal ba// thog med dus nas so so yi// skye bo nga dang ngar 'dzin pas// ma brtags par ni bdag tu bzung // dus/ 
8a3(rgyud 'grel): las byung dang 'dod rgyal dang // gnam gyis bskos dang gyi na dang // 'dzin pa pos ni sprul pa dang // khams kun las ni nges 'byung dang // dbang phyug dang ni byon pa'o// dus dang gtso bo byed pa dang // byed pa 
8a4(rgyud 'grel): po ni ma yin dang // rnal 'byor dang ni tshad ma dang / dag pa dang ni ma dag pa// nang gnas brjod du med pa'i bdag/ skyes bu dang ni khyab bdag dang // srog dang gang zag rnam shes dang // kun gzhi dang ni shes
8a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// mthong ba po dang gzung 'dzin dang // shes pa dang ni shes bya dang // shes las skyes dang shed bu dang // srog dang gso ba la sogs pa// mu stegs rnams kyis rnam par rtogs// nam mkha' dang ni 'gog 
8a6(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis// shin tu 'dus ma byas pa ste// shin tu brtan byas 'dus byas kun// skad cig ma ste bdag po med// phra rab rdul las grub pa ni// blo yi rnam pa med pa ru// kha che bye brag smra bas rtogs// rang gi/ 
8a7(rgyud 'grel): rig pa skyed byed pa// blta bya spyod yul rnam par ni// 'dus ma byas pa gsum po dag/ mo gsham bu bzhin med pa dang // 'du byed thams cad bems bsdigs dang // dus gsum rgyu ba ma yin dang / 
8a8(rgyud 'grel): dman med thogs med gzugs su ni// mdo sde pa yis rab tu rtogs// yan lag can yang don dam min// rdul phran dag kyang de bzhin no// so sor snang ba mi dmigs pa// rmi lam lta bur mi snang ste// 
8b1(rgyud 'grel): gzung 'dzin spangs pa'i ye shes te// don dam shel ltar dag pa ru// rnal 'byor spyod pas rab tu rtogs// so sor snang ba'i gzhung thams cad// don dam min te gcig pa dang // du ma'i rang bzhin 
8b2(rgyud 'grel): bral ba'i phyir// nam mkha'i chu skyes bzhin du ni// gnyis med gnyis su med min zhi// shin tu ji med nam mkha' ltar// blo ldan dbu ma pa yis rtogs// de la sogs te mtha' yas pa// don de kho na la 
8b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas// tha dad so sor rtog pa'o// de bas de dag thams cad kyang // yang dag min pas bla dang bcas// 'og ma 'og ma'i rnal 'byor blo// gong mgong ma khyad par 'phags// 'og ma'i blo ni gang ma yi// 
8b4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyis ni sun 'byin no// de bas gong ma'i rim pa yis// lhan cig pa yi slob dpon gyis// byin gyis brlabs pa yang dag bya// gsal zhing rab dga' nam mkha' 'dra// rang 'byung lhag pa'i lha chen po// 
8b5(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyis// bla ma'i kha las rtogs par bya// de ltar dam tshig sdom ldan pa'i// snod du rtse gcig chu 'dra las// ye shes gzugs brnyan lta bu ru// rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu brtag 
8b6(rgyud 'grel): de thob phyin chad rnal 'byor pas// 'khor ba nyid na gnas pa'i tshe// de yi nyes pas mi gos so// ji ltar sngags dang sman ldan pas// sbrul dag gsod par byed pa bzhin// de 'dra'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug cha/ 
8b7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sman gyis rgyas btab pas// nyon mongs kyis ni ci byar yod// gang zhig lag na gdugs thogs la// de la char pas ci byar yod// de bzhin gnyis med ye shes kyi// gdugs thogs la ni rtog pa 
8b8(rgyud 'grel): yi// char pa rab tu 'bab 'gyur yang // de la de yis ji ltar gnod// de 'dra rab mchog ye shes ni// so so skye bos ga la shes// nyan thos rnams kyis mi shes so// rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi shes// rnal 'byor spyod dang dbu ma pa// byang chub 
9a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpas mi shes so// bla bcas sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang // 'di ni cung zad mi shes so// 'di yi don shes ma 'ongs pa'i// rdo rje 'dzin pa mnyes byas nas// rang gi bsod nams chen 
9a2(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis// yi ge med par rnam par 'pho// de la dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang // gtor ma bzlas pa bgrang phreng dang // skyil mo grung dang stang stabs sogs// spos bral rnam par bslu ba ste// bya ba ma yin 
9a3(rgyud 'grel): dgag pa min// lhag pa'i lha yis sprul phyir ro// bya ba rnams la rnal 'byor pa// lam chen dag tu yongs 'dzin pa// ri dgas smig rgyu snyeg pa ltar// rtag tu snang yang ma zin no// bya ba'i nad chen gyis zin la// 
9a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes g.yo med sman chen gyis// gso byed skyes bu dam pa'o// de bas lus ngag yid gsum gyi// sdom pa mchog la gnas byas nas// nga'o snyam pa'i gzi bskyed la// rim pa gnyis pa de nyid bsgrub/ 
9a5(rgyud 'grel): dkon pa'am yang na grong gi mthar// gang rung cing rung de lta bur// bya bar 'os pa'i las kun yang // byas nas bde ba'i stan la 'dug/ de nas sems can thams cad kun// tshangs spyod chen po bzhis dmigs 
9a6(rgyud 'grel): te// de la sogs pa rang rgyud kyi// las kyi sgrib pa dag byas nas// sems tsam la ni blta byas te// phyi rol rang bzhin stong par bya// sems tsam de yang stong yang stong byas nas// rang rig tsam du gnas 
9a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya// rang rig de yang zla ba sogs// gdan du brtags nas yi ge'o// smug gus bsnun byas mtshan mar gyur// de las rang nyid lhar bskyed la// lha ying rgyal dang ldan par// phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab ste/ 
9a8(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo sprul par bya// de mnyes de la goms bslabs pas// phyi rol lus ni log byed de// sangs rgyas rnams kyis spyod yul mchog/ mtha' yi de nyid bsgom par bya// rang snying dam tshig phyag rgya 
9b1(rgyud 'grel): yis// thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes mchog/ rim pa dang po pa rnams la// yi ge gzugs su rab snang ba// gzhom du med pa rang lha yi// sa bon 'od zer 
9b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga 'bar bas// de yis kha dog rnam lnga yis// 'od zer steng gi sgo yi ni// g.yas nas rnam par spro bar bya// de yi rtsa la dkyil 'khor gyi// 'khor lo ldan pa'i bde gshegs rnams// phyogs bcu'i
9b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten bkang byas nas// dbugs kyi kun rtog las byung ba'i// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas sku// bskyed nas zla bar zhu bya ste// thim nas rnam par dag byas nas// de rnams ye shes ngo bo ru// 
9b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i ha sar zhugs par bya// de yi mtshan ma dbus gnas pa// sa bon la ni gzhug byas par// de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yon tan kun bskyed rin po che// dngos po kun la khyab pa'i
9b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag/ mi shigs pa yi thig le che// 'od zer lnga dang rab ldan pa'i// tsa na ka yi 'bru tsam du// rang gi sems su chos thams cad// bsdus nas rnam par bsam par bya// de yi 'od zer rim pa 
9b6(rgyud 'grel): yis// rang gi gnas ni khyab par bya// de las phyir byung dam tshig rgya// nang gsal de yis phyi yi lus// gsal byas dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// de yi gnas kyang gsal bar ba// de las phyir 
9b7(rgyud 'grel): byung bdag nyid nang // byang chub sems gzugs bcu drug po// mthe bo'i rtsa bar yi ge a// rje ngar gnyis la de bzhin A// brla gnyis la ni i yi gzugs// gsang ba la ni I yi gzugs// lte ba'i rtsa ru 
9b8(rgyud 'grel): u gzugs gnas// de bzhin gsus par U yi gzugs// nu ma gnyis su ra~M gzugs gnas// de bzhin lag par rI gzugs te// mgrin pa la ni le yi gzugs// de bzhin ma mchur yi ge lAM/ 
10a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gram pa gnyis su e gzugs so// de yi mig gnyis yang ni ai// rna ba'i rtsa bar o yi gzugs// spyi bor oM gzugs yang dag gnas// aM AHyi gzugs tshigs kun la/ 
10a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug dus su rdzogs 'gyur ba// gong ma'i 'od kyis rnam bkug ste// thig le du ni gtsug par bya// de ru sems ni cung zad tsam// gzung bas lha yaM 'khor man// rtan dang bcas pa mos pas bsgom/ 
10a3(rgyud 'grel): de dbus bdag bzugs ka ru// gong ma'i rim pas mi shegs pa'i// theg la chen po bsgos byas// yungs kar tshad tsam de las s+ho// rang gi gnas dang phyag rgya yi// nang gsal dkyil 'khor gsal 
10a4(rgyud 'grel): b+has nas// dza mi gnas dang bdag tha ma// nang gsal gyi lus gsal byas nas// dkyil 'khar rten bcas gsal bar bya// de nas bcu drug gnas pa yi// 'od zeng bzhag pa sgrang byas te// byaM yaM lus 
10a5(rgyud 'grel): ni gsal bar bya// de yis dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // rten dang bcas pa gsal byas nas// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// bde gshegs kun gyi spyan sngar gshegs// bdud rtsi zhu nas zhal 
10a6(rgyud 'grel): zhugs te// thig ler bdud rtsi blangs byas nas// rdo rje lam du byung nas su// 'o ma'i rlur ltar sngon byas nas// thabs kyi ye shes g.yas zhugs te// de bzhin gzhan ni g.yon du zhugs// den pa ye shes 
10a7(rgyud 'grel): thig la la// snang ba'i thigs pas thib par 'gyur// de ni 'dzag pa'i ngang tshul can// 'od zer lnga 'bar dkar 'tshor ba// cung zad dmar ba'i nang du sems// mi g.yo zhing na gzung bar bya// dal gang 
10a8(rgyud 'grel): ma'arim pa ltang // zla ba dang ni bsru ba dang // gzung ba yang dag byas 'thurla bas// 'gog pa'i rdo rdzasems nyid du// napa zhig dal reg 'gyur bas// sangs rgyas kun gyi ma tshig 'dzin pa// yi \u0f7f/ 
10b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang 'dra ba yi// rtags rnams yang dag skye bar 'gyur// phung po khams dang skye mched kyi// lha rnams ye shes me yis su// thog mar snying gar sdud byed pa// cho ga 'di ni dang por bshad// de la 
10b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pas byin brlabs pas// sna yi rtse mor 'gro bas na// mi shegs thig le'i rjes thogs la// gsang ba'i thig le bsgom par bshad// gong ma'i ye shes thig le las// 'od zer lcags kyu 'dra ba rnams/ 
10b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcur spros pas bde gshegs rnams// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang bcas kun// bkug nas ye shes ngo bo ru// rang gi snying gar rab tu btsud// de rnams zhu nas thig le la// zhugs pas rdul dang / 
10b4(rgyud 'grel): mun pa dang // snying stobs tshul du thig le yang // snying gi pad+ma la babs nas// rang gi rdo rje nor bu yi// dkyil du rnam par gnas pa las// 'byung ba lnga yi gzugs can mchog/ ye shes lnga yi ngo bo nyid// 
10b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer lnga 'bar dang lha yi// mtshan ma phra bo rnam bsams nas// de yi bum pa rten gyi tshad// yungs kar tsam dbus 'khor lo che// theg ler bcas pa mos par bsgom// gal te de la rang gi sems/ 
10b6(rgyud 'grel): bying bar song ngam skyob na// rdo rje las ni phyir byung ste// sna rtser rnam par gnas byas nas// dga' bral dga' bas brtag par bya// 'di yi thig le rnal 'byor las// gong gi rim pas 'od zer lnga// steng gi 
10b7(rgyud 'grel): sgo las 'byung ba dang // slar yang bdud rtsi 'gugs pa dang // de bzhin gzhi la gzhug pa dang // dbugs dgag stong pa'i yan lag go/ de nas gsang ba'i thig le che// rab tu phra ba gong ma bzhin// rang sems 
10b8(rgyud 'grel): dal budal bus gzung // dngos po med pa'i gnas su 'gyur// de yang gzung ba goms pa yis// phyin logs ni rnam par log/ smig rgyu lta bu snang ba ni// rtags ni dang por shes par bya// de bzhin du ni chu 
11a1(rgyud 'grel): / log pas// du ba lta bur 'byung ba ni// gnyis pa yin par shes par bya// me ni rnam par log gyur pas// mkha' snang 'dra ba gsum pa'o// rlung ni de bzhin log pas ni// mar me lta bu rab 
11a2(rgyud 'grel): sdang ba// rtags ni bzhi par shes par bya// de bzhin byin log rnam par shes// log pas za ba gsal gnyis med kyi// don dran sprin med nam mkha' ltar// gsal ba rtag ni lnga pa'o// mtshan ma lnga po de/ 
11a3(rgyud 'grel): yis ni// mi gnas mya ngan 'das thob pas// rnal 'byor pas ni 'di la 'bad// gzung ba yi ni yan lag go// de ltar de la mtshan ma la// mthong byas don des khyab bya'i phyir// rdo rje lani lam nas sra/ 
11a4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' khams su spro bar bya// spros pa de las mngon mthong ba'i// so sor snang ba bskyed par bya// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang // chos ni yang dag rjes dran dang // rdo rje rjes su dran pa dang // rigs ni/ 
11a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag rjes dran dang // khro bo rjes su dran pa ni// snang mdzad dang ni tshe dpag med// mi bskyod rin chen 'byung ldan sogs// gshin rje ga shed sogs kho bo'o// dkyil 'khor su sogs ji snyed po// spo bstsal/ 
11a6(rgyud 'grel): nigasal bar bya// de bzhin dam tshig rjes dran ni// rjes su chags dang cho ga bzhi// dang po spobasku las gsal bya// dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ni// cho ga gnyis pa la sogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor spro 
11a7(rgyud 'grel): bsngal gsal bya// sku ni rjes su dran pa dang // gsung dang thugs ni rjes dran dang // sems can rjes su dran pa ni// sku dang gsung thugs bsgoms pa yi// rdo rje gsum ni spro bsku las// rnam par smon cing 
11a8(rgyud 'grel): dran pa'o// de bzhin sngags ni thams cad kyi// spyi gzugs rjes su dran pa ni// ye shes lnga yis ye shes sems// bskyed pa dang ni rang gi lha// longs spyod bzhi ldan spo bsu las// rjes su gsal dang 
11b1(rgyud 'grel): rnyed pa'o// dam tshig rje su dran pa ni// bdud rtsi myang ba la sogs pa// spro bsngalas ni gsal byed pa'o// shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang // ma skyes rjes su dran pa ni// spros pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang // ci yang 
11b2(rgyud 'grel): yod pa ma yin te// de ni gnyis med ngo bo ru// spro bsdu las ni dran pa'o// zhe sdang rigs la sogs pa yi// mchod pa rjes dran sbyor ba ni// rang gi rigs la sogs pa yi// mchod pa rjes dran sbyor ba ni// rang gi/ 
11b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi bu mo mchog/ bar ma'i longs spyod bzhi dag pa// rjes su chags pas mnyes bya ba// spro bsdu las ni gsal byed pa'o// rjes su dran pa'i yan lag go/ de ltar yan lag gsum gyis ni// gsang/ 
11b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thig le bsgom byas nas// nor bu las ni byung nas kyang // khams gsum khyab par byed pas ni// sprul pa'i thig le bsgom pa bshad// rang gi spyi bo dbus su ni// sku yi rdo rje thugs karA// mtshan ma la gnas 
11b5(rgyud 'grel): rlung dkyil 'khor// dud ka 'dra bar zla ba la// oM dkar 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid bsam// de bzhin mgrin pa'i dbus su yang // gsung gi rdo rje thugs ka yi// mtshan ma'i dbus su chu dkyil 'khor// dkar 
11b6(rgyud 'grel): po dbus su zla ba la// A dmar gnas pa'i rang bzhin bsgom// thugs kar thugs kyi rdo rje yi// thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i// mi yi dkyil 'khor dmar po la// zla ga nas dbus su hUM nag po// 'gro 
11b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rang bzhin bsams nas kyang // nu ma gnyis kyi bar du yang // dam tshig phyag rgya'i thugs ka ru// mtshan ma la gnas dbang chen ni// dkyil 'khor ser po zla ba la// rang gi lha yi sa bon che// 'byung dang 
11b8(rgyud 'grel): 'jug dang gnas pa la// rnam par grol ba'i sa bonabs pas// de ltar phyag rgya ban chen dang / bdag nyid 'brel par byas nas su// rim pa 'di yis mi shigs pa'o// rdo rje bzlas pa'i jo bo bya// g.yas / 
12a1(rgyud 'grel): nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po ste// kha dog dud ka rgyu ba las// 'byung ba hUM gi ngo bo yis// snang srid chos kun khyab byas nas// chos kun dag byas bdud rtsi// 
12a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// oM gyi ngo bos 'ongs byas nas// rang gi rgyud kyi bag chags ni// bkrus nas dag byas de la zhugs// a yi ngo bos gnas byas nas// de la lha yi de bzhin nyid// gzung bas dal bus dal
12a3(rgyud 'grel): bus byas// dngos po med pa'i gnas su 'gyur// g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po ste// kha dog dkar po rab gnas pa// de las byung ba'i hUM dang ni// oM gyi rang bzhin 
12a4(rgyud 'grel): 'du ba dang // A yi rang bzhin gnas pa dang // de nyid gzung ba snga ma bzhin// gnyi ga las ni drag tu 'byung // me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog dmar po ngo bo las// hUM gis spos dang oM 
12a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis bsdus// A yis gnas pa de nyid gzung // snga ma bzhin du shes par bya// de bzhin gnyis las dal bu 'byung // dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor rgya// kha dog gser ltar rab snang ba// de la hA 
12a6(rgyud 'grel): gis 'byung ba dang // oM gyis sdud dang AHyis gnas// de la de nyid rab bzung bas// 'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba las// grol ba'i ye shes rnyed 'gyur ba// som nyi yid gnyis ma byed cig
12a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bzhi 'brel bzlas pa ni// nyes brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ste// de ni dgu brgya rnam pa bsgres// zhag gcig du ni nyi shu bzhis// bri phrag gnyis dang gcig stong dang // brgya phrag drug tu rus thams cad/ 
12a8(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis// nyin mtshan bzlas brjod grangs byed do// 'di yis rnam pa'i chos thams cad// sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang // brag ca mgal me'i 'khor lo dang // 'khrul pa dri 
12b1(rgyud 'grel): za'i grong khyer dang / chu bur dang ni mig 'phrul dang // gzugs brnyan chu zla la sogs par// thams cad shes shing sa bcu pa'i// dbang phyug rnams dang bskal mnyam ste// rang bzhin bzlas pa
12b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di la ni// rnal 'byor pas ni rab tu 'bad// 'di ni thog ma med dus nas// rang bzhin yang dag rtag zlo yang // bla ma yang dag ma brten par// don 'di rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// de ni yang dag shes 
12b3(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// bsgom pa'i bar chad phyi rol gyi// bzlas pa yongs su spang bar bya// bzlas pa'i ngo bo chen po mchog/ rdo rje 'chang ba brjod med sku// bsam brjod yul las rab 'das pas// ngag gis 
12b4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bzlas pa byed// de bas glang chen rnyed gyur pa// rjes kyis de la ci zhig bya// don de la gnas rnal 'byor che// phyi rol yang ni rten mi 'gal// glang po che yi stobs kyis ni// bud shing 'byung ba 
12b5(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'o// de bas rdo rje bzlas pa mchog/ 'bad pas bde gshegs thams cad kyis// byin rlabs nyid ni 'ong bas na// phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa yi// mtshan ma yang dang yang 'byung 'gyur// de byung tshig 
12b6(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pas// skad cig gis ni kun mkhyen che// rgyud las rab tu 'pho bar ni// the tshom med par nges pas na// cho ga 'di la rab tu 'bad// de ltar dga' gsum bye brag gi/ thig le rnam gsum 
12b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa yi// cho ga yang dag bstan pa'o// da ni gnyis med ye shes nyid// kun rdzob gzugs la brten nas kyang // mi g.yo la sogs g.yo dang bcas// tshangs sogs lha dang lha min sogs// thams cad 
12b8(rgyud 'grel): rab tu mi snang yang // thig le 'gog par mi 'gyur te// rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas pa kun// slar yang de las 'byung bar byed// de las skye bo rnams kyis ni// yang dag ma rtogs pa yi phyir// tshangs pa'i sgo nga 
13a1(rgyud 'grel): las skyes par// 'khrul pas chos rnams kyis mi bskul// gang gis kyang ni mi shigs pa// ji srid 'di ni lus gnas pas// las dang las min rab byed pa// brtan po 'jigs// 
13a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rab spangs pa'i// mi shigs thig le bsgom par bshad// tshangs pa'i spyod pa bzhi po dang // phyi rol stong byas la sogs pa// rang gi lha ru bskyed nas kyang // phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab pa// snga ma 
13a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du shes byas nas// rim pa 'di yis thig le la// rang gi sems ni yang dag gzung // rang gi ye shes sems dpa' yi// mtshan ma'i dbus gnas sa bon las// 'od zer lnga 'phros de yi rtse// 
13a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dpag med sprul// de yis khams kun khyab byas nas// dbugs kyi rta zhon kun rtog rnams// rnam par bsal te de dag kyang // dkyil 'khor 'khor lor rab byas te// gnyis pa'i 
13a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bsdu byas nas// ye shes ngo bo sna bug g.yon// zhugs byas mtshan ma'i dbus gnas bya// sa bon la ni thim pas kyang // de ni phyogs dus gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas yon tan ci gsungs pa// 
13a6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bskyed byed mi shigs pa'i// thig le 'od zer lnga 'bar ba// rnam par gsal byas de las kyang // 'od zer 'byung bas rang gnas kyang // ye shes sems dpa' na nga gsal te// de yi phyi dang dkyil 'khor
13a7(rgyud 'grel): dang // gnas ni gsal bya de las byung // mthe bo'i rtsa dang rje ngar dang // brla gnyis dang ni gsang ba'i gnas// lte ba dang ni gsus pa dang // nu ma gnyis dang lag rtse dang // mgrin pa dang ni mchu gnyis dang / 
13a8(rgyud 'grel): 'gram pa gnyis dang mig gnyis dang // rna ba'i rtsa dang spyi bo dang // tshigs kun thig le a sogs kyi// gzugs su gnas pa sgrub byas nas// mi shigs thig ler thim par bya// der ni rang gi sems cung 
13b1(rgyud 'grel): zad// bzung bas rten dang brten can gyi// 'khor lor mos byas de dbus su// mi shigs thig le ye shes la// snang ba'i ngo bo bsgom par bya// de yi 'od kyis rang gnas sogs// gsal byas ye shes
13b2(rgyud 'grel): thig le yi// nang gsal bzhag pa'i 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// spyan sngar bdud rtsi zhu byas nas// zhal du zhugs nas snying ga yi// mi shigs thig ler rab song 
13b3(rgyud 'grel): ste// k+ShuM gzugs bdud rtsir rab blangs nas// rdo rje lam nas phyung nas su// 'o ma'i rgyun ltar phyogs bcu nas// 'ongs pa yis ni sems can dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang mi rgyur bcas// yang dag bsdus 
13b4(rgyud 'grel): nas bur sogs zhugs// de bzhin chos dbyings phyag rgya dang // rten gyi 'khor lor zhugs byas nas// de dag yang ni rab bsdus te// dkyil 'khor du ni rab bsdus nas// de yang bdag la bsdu byas te// 
13b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid kyang ni mi snang bar// ye shes sems dpa'i gnas la dmigs// de yang 'khor lo 'khor lo yang // ye shes sems dpar gzhug par bya// ye shes sems dpa' mi snang nas// mtshan ma 'ba' 
13b6(rgyud 'grel): zhig la dmigs bya// mtshan ma de yang bsdu byas nas// mi shigs thig ler sems bzung ste// de las yang ni nang gi tshogs// kun bsdus rang snang thig le che// 'ba' zhig la sems yang dag gzung // 
13b7(rgyud 'grel): ci ltar nus bzhin bsgom pas der// sems ni yang dang yang du zhugs// yang ni de las phyir byung ste// de yi gnas dang rang gi lus// dmigs nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // rten dang khams gsum 
13b8(rgyud 'grel): snang bar bya// de nas yang ni gong ma ltar// rim pas bcug nas thim byas la// sems ni thig ler bzhag par bya// rang gi dbang po der bzung nas// sa yi dkyil 'khor tshu la zhugs// chu de me la de 
14a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin zhugs// me yang rlung la rab tu zhugs// brlang yang sems la zhugs par gyur// sems ni gnyis med ye shes su// cung zad zhugs pas brtags gnas pa// smig rgyu 'dra dang 
14a2(rgyud 'grel): du ba dang // mar me mkha' snang rab 'dra ba// sprin med nam mkha' ltar snang ba'i// mtshan ma lnga po 'byung bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' zhugs phyir ro// thig le la ni sems bzung ste// glal zhing 
14a3(rgyud 'grel): rgod dang 'dar la sogs// rnal 'byor de la gang tshe 'byung // thig le yang dag spro byas nas// gong ma'i rim pas kun khyab bya// 'di ni yang dag goms byas pas// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa che// thabs
14a4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi ni bsgrub bya mchog/ rdo rje 'chang ba chen po thob/ 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa yi// ye shes 'ba' zhig dbang byas nas// rim pa gnyis pa bsgom pa'i thabs// mi shigs thig le basmos pa'o// de ltar 
14a5(rgyud 'grel): chos kun de bzhin nyid// dpag med dam pa'i phun sum tshogs// de dmigs yang dag skyes 'gyur ba// bsgom pa'i cho ga rnam bshad nas// rnam grangs dag kyang yongs su bstan// de bzhin nyid dang yang dag 
14a6(rgyud 'grel): mtha'// bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi dbyings// chos nyid dang ni chos sbyor med// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med// smon pa med pa nyid dang yang // nyon mongs khur chen 'bor byed pa// skye ba med dang 'od gsal ba// 
14a7(rgyud 'grel): mngon par bya ni chub pa dang // gzhan gyi sems shes byed pa dang // lha yi rna ba ster ba dang // de bzhin lha yi mig ster dang // rdzu 'phrul dpag med sprul chen dang // dngos po mthar ni phyin pa dang // don dam pa yi/ 
14a8(rgyud 'grel): bden pa dang // rdzogs pa yi ni rim pa dang // yongs su dag pa'i su gtsang dang // kun gyi bsten bya nyid dag dang // mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa dang // glo bur dri mas mi gos dang // gad nas 'od gsal 
14b1(rgyud 'grel): pab nyid dang // gang gis kyang ni mi shigs dang // dngos po med pa nyid dang ni// rgyu sogs bcu gnyis 'byung byed dang // dpal chen ye shes yongs dag dang // thig le chen po yongs dag dang // sangs 
14b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi gsang chen dang // nam mkha' nam mkha'i spyod yul dang // bsgom pa med pa nyid dang ni// rje btsun man ngag chen po dang // rna nas rna bar 'pho byed dang // nyan thos kyis ni shes min dang // 
14b3(rgyud 'grel): rang sangs rgyas sogaso mi shes dang // yi ge med pa nyid dang ni// tshig dang bral dang brjod med sogs// de la mdo dang rgyud rnams las// de 'dra rnam pa mtha' yas pa// gsungs shing yang dag gsung 'gyur ba// der ni de 
14b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyid 'di las// gzhan ni ci yang ma gsungs so// de bas dad pa sngon 'gro ba'i// sems kyis chos kun de bzhin nyid// gsal zab gnyis med don chen po// rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na// bla ma'i gsungs ni yang dag 
14b5(rgyud 'grel): gzung // de gzung gong ma'i rim pa yis// rtag tu gom byed skyes bu gang // de la brtan pa'i rtags skyes nas// sa nas sar ni 'phar ba ltar// blo yi rnam pa gong du 'phel// rig 'dzin la sogs sprul pa yis// 
14b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ni don de la sbyor byed// de yis bstan 'gyur rnal 'byor pa// sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur// bdag nyid can des bsgrub pa'i mchog/ ji skad gsungs pa brtsam par bya// lha mo klu mo gnod 
14b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin mo// mi mo mi 'am ci mo 'am// mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams// rang gi nus pas brtsam par bya// smon pa'i brtul zhugs la sogs pas// zla drug sogs par rab tu 'bad// de yis rje btsun 
14b8(rgyud 'grel): yig med pa// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun ngo bo// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad gnas// chos kun de bzhin nyid zab pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsgrub bya mchog/ gong ma'i rim pa rnal 'byor pa// 'bad pa che// 
15a1(rgyud 'grel): thang rab byas pas// de ltar de ru mtshan nyid kyi// tshul du cung zad rab gnas pa'i// dga' dang dga' ba bar ma dang // dga' dang bral ba'i dus su yang // ji bzhin gnas pa'i dga' ba gsum// / 
15a2(rgyud 'grel): ji skad gsung ba thob par 'gyur// de nas mtha' med 'khor ba'i bar// rtag pa dang ni mi gdung dang // bsil ba dang ni gcig pa dang // bde ba dang ni dri med dang // dga' ba dang ni yid dga' ba// 'di ni bde 
15a3(rgyud 'grel): chen ro myang brgyad// bdag pa rdo rje 'chang ba mchog/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bya ba byas pa byed pa byas// dbang phyug chen po khur chen por// tshor ma dkrugs pa thams cad mkhyen// skyes bu 
15a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo cang shes pa// glang po chen po dul ba'o// 'khor ba'i mtha' yi pha rol son// don dam dang ni kun rdzob kyi// bden pa gnyis med rnal 'byor che// tha ba spangs pa'am lam kun rdzogs// yon tan 'byung 
15a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas kun tu bzang // thams cad 'dus pa'i de kho na// sku sogs khams kun 'gengs pa'o// gong na med pa yang dag gnas// de ltar de sogs rab grags pa// ming ni rnam pa mtha' yas pa// gnyis med
15a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mtshon pa ste// mdo dang rgyud rnams thams cad du// blo ldan rnams kyis rtogs par bya// sa bcu dang ni rab ldan pa'i// gong ma'i lha mo rdo rje 'dzin/ dge ba bcu gsum la gnas pa// skad cig gis ni yang dag tu// 
15a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrib bral de yis rtogs par byed// phreng ba ha ra nu phur sogs// mdog dang ku tsa la sogs pa// pad+ma brtags pa'i dga' shes pa// dang por rab tu shes par bya// sha rdzas gri tra grin sogs// glu dbyangs bstod 
15a8(rgyud 'grel): dang sid sgra yi// snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis dga' 'gyur bas// gnyis pa ru ni shes par bya// tsan dan la sogs sna tshogs dris// lus byugs lhan cig rtsen byed tshe// dga' ba yang dag thob byed pa// gsum pa ru ni 
15b1(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// ma mchu sbrang rtsis gzhibs byas pas// mgor gnas byang chub sems 'dzubs// ro 'thung dga' bas bdag mnyes pas// bzhi par rab tu shes par bya// lus la byug cing sna tshogs kyi// 
15b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod pas rtsen tsha reg bya yis// yang dag dga' bar byed pas na// lnga pa ru ni shes par bya// de yis ye shes rnam pa gsum// rig par byed cing rang gi yid// yang dag dga' bar rab byed pa// drug par shes bya/ 
15b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pas// de yi lus ni bdag gi ni// rten du gnas pa sra ba yis// yang dag dga' bar byed pas na// bdun pa ru ni shes par bya// de yi pad+ma'i zil sogs dang // byang sems rlan gyis rang gi sems// 
15b4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dga' bar byed pas na// brgyad par rab tu shes par bya// gsang gnas drod sogs tsha ba yis// bdag gi yid ni yang dag par// dga' bar byed pa'i mchog yin pas// dgu pa ru ni shes par bya// 
15b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas bskyod pas ye shes mes// phung po khams sogs sreg byed pas// yid ni yang dag dga' 'gyur bas// bcu par rab tu shes par bya// bcu po de yis dang po dang // phyis kyi 'bras bu mchog 'gyur ba// 
15b6(rgyud 'grel): gong du gsungs pa rab thob ste// de bas de 'dra'i don chen la// yang dag 'jug par mi nus pa'i// gdul bya rnams la bde gshegs kyis// rab tu dga' sogs mtshan nyid du// bstan nas de yi don zhugs
15b7(rgyud 'grel): pas// de yis rtogs kyang bla dang bcas// de nyid dang po rnal 'byor la// rten dang brten can dkyil 'khor gyi// 'khor lo rab tu bstan byas nas// de zhugs de la brtan byas pas// rtogs kyang don 'di ma 
15b8(rgyud 'grel): shes na// yang dag sangs rgyas ma yin no// de ni rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// lhag pa'i lha zhes bya ba ni// bcu gsums zhes bya bar bshad// de ltar rim pa gnyis pa yi// 
16a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid ni thabs bcas pa'i// bdud rtsi mchog 'di rnal 'byor gang // 'thung bar byed pa sangs rgyas kyi// de yi sras su nges pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi grogs// 
16a2(rgyud 'grel): rig pa 'dzin pa'i dpon po ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi khyo ru 'gyur// nyan thos dang 'dren rnams kyi ni// 'dren par byed pa'i gtso bo ste// sems can phal pa'i rje btsun no// de la phyogs bcu khams 
16a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rig pa'i lha dang khro bo sogs// me tog la sogs mchod par bcas// zhag gcig skya reng dang po dang // byed ni dros pa'i dus nyid dang / 
16a4(rgyud 'grel): cha la tshil mtshams su nam mkha' las// mchod pa byas nas sngags brjod cing // rang gi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur// de bas dag pa'i lha rnams kyang // de bzhin du ni mchod byed na// ma dag pa yi lha/ 
16a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni// de la ci yi phyir mi mchod// sems can phal pa gzhan gyis ni// me tog snyim pa bkang nas ni// mgrin pa dma' bas zhabs 'dud cing // rtag tu bskur bar shin tu 'os// de ni skyes bu 
16a6(rgyud 'grel): rkang gnyis gtso// kun mkhyen rnams kyis bzhag pa ste// byin log khur chen por byed pas// ma 'ongs rdo rje 'chang ba ste// de la brnyas byed sems can gang // sgrib pa po de glang dang 'dra// de yis nga 
16a7(rgyud 'grel): la brnyas byed pas// ngas ni de kun dus kun spong // cig shos lus lang gnas phyir// mchod cing brjod pas lus rnams kyi// sgrib pa de yis dag byed do// rim pa gnyis 'dir sgrub pa po// rtse gcig/ 
16a8(rgyud 'grel): pa yis rnam par gzung // de gzung tshe 'di nyid la yang // brtul zhugs cho ga nyid kyis ni// lha mos rkyen ni rab byas te// phyag rgya chen po rang rgyud la// 'pho bar the tsom mi bya'o// da ni rang nyid byin brlab 
16b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// rim pa 'di ni rnal 'byor pa// bya bas bskal pa 'ga' zhig la// yang dag tu ni bshad par bya// gang zhig bla ma mnyes byas nas// des gnang dam sdom bcas pa ru// bum pa la sogs rab
16b2(rgyud 'grel): thob ste// bla ma'i zhal las rnyed pa yi// de bzhin nyid ni rab thob cing // gsang dang mchog tu gsang rig pas// ji skad bshad pa'i bya ba yis/ yang dag bsgom ni mi nus pas// ji bzhin pa yi de kho/ 
16b3(rgyud 'grel): na// rim pa 'di yis bsgom par bya// gang zhig dus ni phyi zhig la// 'chi ba'i mtshan ma bdag gis mthong // 'chi bar gyur pa'i dus byung na// nad kyis yang dag ma rnyogs par// 'pho ba'i sbyor ba 
16b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bya// dpral ba dang ni lte ba dang // spyi gtsug dang ni mig dang ni// rna ba dang ni sna dag dang // chu yi gnas dang chu min gnas// kha yi gnas dang ye shes kyi// 'gro 'ong gi ni rtags zhes bya// dpral 
16b5(rgyud 'grel): ba gzugs kyi khams kyi ni// rtags skyes pa ru shes par bya// lte bar 'dod khams lha rnams kyi// rtags byung de ru skye bar nges// spyi gtsug gzugs med khams rnams kyi// rtags byung de ru skye bar 
16b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// sna gnyis ye shes 'pho ba na// gnod sbyin gnas su skye bar 'gyur// rna gnyis rig pa 'dzin pa yi// gnas su nges par 'gro ba'o// mig gnyis mi rnams rgyal por 'gyur// rtags ni yang 
16b7(rgyud 'grel): dag skye bar 'gyur// kha ru ye shes 'pho ba na// yi dgas rtags su shes par bya// chu gnas dud 'gro rnams kyi rtags// rtags su yang dag rab shes bya// chu min bu gar ye shes 'gro// dmyal ba 
16b8(rgyud 'grel): rtags su shes par bya// de ltar ye shes 'pho ba yi// rnam pa'i cha ni shes byas nas// sgrogs pa lnga yi yi ge yis// steng gi sgo bdun dgag par bya// chu yi sgo ru s+t+waM gi dgag/ chu min k+She gis dgag 
17a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de ltar sgo dgu bkag nas kyang // rim pa 'di yis rang sems kyis// gnas ni rab tu btsal byas pas// dbyings nyid du ni nges par 'gro// phung po skye mched khams rnams su// / 
17a2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rgyud kyis dpyad pa ltar// rnam par bsgom byas ye shes so// gong na med pa rtog par 'gyur// bdag nyid ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// lha yi lus su gyur byas la// chos kyi dbyings dang rnam shes
17a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // bdag nyid sangs rgyas bskur byas pa'i// gnas ni rin chen sna tshogs pa'i// kha dog sna lngas rab brgyan pa'i// rdo rje rtse mo dgu pa mchog/ bdag gi spyi bo'i steng du ni// bsams nas de ru rang gi sems// 
17a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dkar po bcu tshal tsam// rtse lnga bsams nas brtag par bya// yar gyi rtse lnga thabs lnga ste// de bzhin mar bltas shes rab lnga// dbus kyi bum pa ri bong can// bsams nas de ru ye shes che// ser po 
17a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems 'dra ba// 'dzag pa'i ngang tshul dang 'dra ba// thig le tsa na ka yi 'bru// lnga 'byor tshad du bsgom par bya// de nas chos kun thams cad kun// med par bsams nas bdag dmigs te// 
17a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag kyang bdag la thim byas nas// sems tsam de yang mda' bzhin du// spyi bor rdo rje 'og cha yi// bu gur zhugs nas thig le thim// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// lha mo rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi// 
17a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas su shes par rab tu bya// de ni gdod nas grub pa'i gzugs// de ru shes pa rab zhugs pa// sems de yang dang yang du gzung // de las sems de yar bltar// rdo rje rtse dgu steng cha yi// bu gur byung 
17a8(rgyud 'grel): nas sna tshogs kyi// pad+mar zla ba gnas pa la// rdo rje sems dpa'i skur gyur te// mtshan dang dpe byad kun brgyan pa// rgyan kun brgyan pa'i na bza' dang // bral nas shin tu gsal dmigs te// de gnyis 
17b1(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sbyor ba yis// byin brlabs las byung 'khor lo che// rnam par 'phro zhing 'du bar bsam// de ltar rnam par bsgom pa mchog/ yang dang yang du ci nus bsgom// bsam pa de yi rkyen gyis ni// 
17b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag sems dbyings su zhugs pa'i tshe// gsal zhing rab dga' mkha' 'dra rtogs// de nas rdzu 'phrul shugs ldan pa'i// lo lnga lon pa'i byis pa'i gzugs// 'grub tshe dpe med ba de rdzogs 
17b3(rgyud 'grel): rtogs// de las skye gnas gzhan du ni// 'phen par byed tshe sprul pa'i gzugs// yang dag du ni rtogs par 'gyur// de lta bas na sems can gyi// bsam pa gang dang gang dag gis// mi rnams yid ni 
17b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag sbyong // de dang de ni mdo bzhin du// sna tshogs nor bu lta bur 'gyur// chos sku rab dga' mkha' mnyam pa// shi dang brgyal dang gnyid log dang // glal dang 'khrig dus skad cig tsam// myong bar
17b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bas rab bsgoms na// lus can rnams ni yid ni sbyong // cho ga 'di yis sems can gang // mtshams med byed cing rmongs pa yi// / skye bo bram ze gsod pa yang // de yis mi 'grub cung zad med// 
17b6(rgyud 'grel): de bas bka' lung rab thob nas// dam sdom rnam par bsrung byas te// sku gsum 'grub par the tshom med// gal te sku gsum ma grub na// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtsor 'gyur te// rim gyis phyag rgya chen por 
17b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de ltar rnam pa gsum gyis ni// dngos grub de ni bsgom pa bshad// gang zhig 'di ni ma rtogs par// gsang ba smra bar byed pa ni// de la nga dang de bzhin gshegs// nam zhig de la sbyar byas pas// 
17b8(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis rlob par mi byed do// 'di ni don ldan 'ga' zhig la// nga ni de yi lus gnas te// bsgrub pa gzhan la mchod pa len// de yis de mnyes rang gi rgyud// las kyi sgrib pa dag byed do// 'di don rna bar 'pho 
18a1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa// gang gi dus su gnas pa der// sangs rgyas bstan pa rin chen yang // gnas par rab tu bshad pa yin// brgyad pa'i rim pa 'di chad nas// sangs rgyas bstan pa nub par ru// kun gyis 
18a2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu shes par bya// de bas khyod kyi yid gcig tu// yang dag bsdus la ma 'ongs pa'i// gang zag mngon du tshogs bskyed pa'i// skal ldan 'ga' la rnam par brgyud// sim byed 'di la sbyor du chug 
18a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di sbyor 'di ni yang dag pa'i// rnal 'byor pa ru shes par bya// khyod kyang zas kyi spyod pa dang // nga la cung zad 'khrul rtogs pas// khyod kyis tshe 'di nyid la ni// gzugs bcas phung po rang lus ni// 
18a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas ni yang dag mi 'gyur te// rnam par shes pa mi shigs pa// phyag rgya chen por rab tu 'grub// de bas khyod kyis yang dag blos// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dus pa'i rgyud// gsang chen gsang la ches 
18a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba// gong na med pa'i lung chen po// 'di yi rim pa dang po yi// sgrub pa'i thabs dang sbyin sreg dang // gtor ma sna tshogs 'khor lo dang // bsdus pa dang ni rnam bshad dang // dkyil 'khor cho ga la sogs 
18a6(rgyud 'grel): pa// mi shes mun sgrib sems can gyi// thur ma lta bur brtsam par gyis// de bas ma 'ongs rnal 'byor ches// 'di shes bla ma rab mnyes te// yang dag 'dod pas blangs byas nas// sems ni de nas sbyang 
18a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// sems ni kun rtog rnam spangs nas// de sbyor de la rig pa skye// rig pa skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin// nga grub pas na sangs rgyas dang // pha rol phyin dang gzungs rnams dang // sa rnams thams cad bde chen po// 
18a8(rgyud 'grel): rjes las yang dag 'grub par 'gyur// thams cad bde chen las byung phyir// de bsgoms ci phyir de mi 'byung // de bas rab tu 'bad pa yis// mchog gi de nyid rab gsang gsang // smon lam gyis kyang tha na 
18b1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// bsgrub pa la ni shin tu 'bod// a la la la ho// de ltar rol pa'i gar bcas sgra brnyan lta bu rdo rje'i glu/ 'khor lor bcas pas de nyid glu blangs bdag la bstod cing nam mkha'i khams su sprin 
18b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams med pa lta bur thim par 'gyur// dge slong bla ma gnyis bcas de yang de bzhin mi snang 'gyur// rdo rje gdan gyi 'gab nas rgyang grags lnga bcu song ba'i sar// pa ra pa ta yi phug la brten te sems can 
18b3(rgyud 'grel): don bya'i phyir// 'di bsdus rab tu byed pa thams cad rtsom dang ston sogs byas// dam pas gsol ba rgya chen btab pas bdag ni shin tu brod// der gnas 'khor bcas rnams kyi yo byad gos zas nor gyi 
18b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// mchod pa'i yo byad rgya chen sna tshogs 'khor lo bya ba rnams// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpar gyur pa mdzod gsungs gnod gnas che// nyin re ka rA pa Na bdun brgyas rtag tu rab tu sbyor// de nas 
18b5(rgyud 'grel): bla ma chen po b+ha li ba tI drung du bgrod// bdag gis bla ma de yang mnyes bya'i phyir na sgrub pa'i thabs// cung zad bsdus pas de ru tha ma la sogs kun// mnyes par byas te sngon gnas bgrod nas skal ldan don 
18b6(rgyud 'grel): dga' byas// de bas de ltar kun gyis gtam rgyud rgyas par shes byas te// mkhas pa'i gzu bo dam pa thabs kun gyis ni mnyes bya ste// de yi lung la rab tu byed sogs mnyam dang bsam par bya// de la rab brten 
18b7(rgyud 'grel): dgon sogs rab tu brten byas rang gi sems// de nyid bsgoms pas ji bzhin rab tu rtogs par byas pa yis// tshe 'di nyid la zla ba drug gis byang chub thob pa 'di ni su yis bzlog/ bdud rtsi mchog 'thung 'di// 
18b8(rgyud 'grel): ni sems can kun gyis bkur ba'i gnas// sems chen de la rdo rje 'chang dang bder gshegs kun gyis bsngags// de'i phyir log pa'i sgrib pa thams cad sa bon nyams byas te// 'khor bar gnas kyang skyon
19a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi gos pad+ma bzhin rtag du gnas// de ru ma thob lan grangs gzhan la yang dag myong ba yi// 'bras bu smin byed sngags pa'i yid la yang dag 'byung ba yi// dngos grub rgya chen thob nas gang+gA'i 
19a2(rgyud 'grel): bye snyed dpag med kyi// 'khor gyis bskor nas 'jig rten khams kun thams cad rab tu bgrod// de bas chu 'khor drag po khar lhung ltar// lus dang ngag dang sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed// rim par sngon
19a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rab tu bsgrub par bya// dal 'byor lus 'di shin tu g.yo sla bas// ji ltar rlung gis par me gsod pa ltar// skad cig tsam du mi sdod dus 'da' byed// de bas 'dir ni chud gsan mi bya ste// dngos kun
19a4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid mchog chen rab bsgom bya// de nyid spyod pa 'di la blo nges pas// ji skad bshad bzhin rab tu 'gyur bas na// sems ni yang dag bstan par gyis shig ces// bdag ni sems can rnams la gsol 
19a5(rgyud 'grel): ba 'debs// gang gi phyir na 'di na gsang bas na// bdag gis gsal bar ma byas ci yod pa// des na de shes bla ma yang dag par// mnyes byas de nyid 'dod pas yang dag long // 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pas/ 
19a6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag spyod pa la// snying po'i snying po 'bras gsol yang dag sbyong // mtha' yi phar son bla chen yon tan ma lus rten// de las 'di ni yang dag zhal rnyed byas// de bas rnal 'byor chen po rgyud kyi don rnams ni// 
19a7(rgyud 'grel): mi 'tsham par ni snang yang nyi ma'i dpes// rang dang gzhan gyi don byed rus pas na// rnal 'byor 'gas ni shin tu 'bad dgos so// the tshom som nyi med par dad pa yis// 'di don grus pas yang dag blangs 
19a8(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// shes rab kyis ni yang dang yang du rang // spyad pas bdag la gnyis med ye shes che// chu gtsang nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar// 'byung 'gyur 'di la the tshom ma byed cig/ 'di ni rang bzhin 
19b1(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i man ngag las/ brgyud pa'i bla ma yang dag rab brten dang // rang gi bsod nams tshogs ni sngon bskyed pas// rtogs par rab tu 'gyur ba ma rtogs par// bsod nams chung ba'i mi yis bskal pa/ 
19b2(rgyud 'grel): dpag med par// 'di ni rtogs par mi 'gyur 'di don ma rtogs na// rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya de la mi bya'o// de ltar rab tu shes par byas nas su// rdzogs pa chen po ye shes spyi yi gzugs// 
19b3(rgyud 'grel): yongs su dag sku rdo rje 'chang chen po// dpal ldan kun gyi ngo bo rim gnyis 'dis// sdug bsngal lam bcas bskal pa gsum du yang // rang gi rjes mthun byang chub bla dang bcas// thob nas de bde/ 
19b4(rgyud 'grel): nung tsam rab chags pa// rnal 'byor 'di yis ci phyir de mi bsgom// dad dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab dang // dran pa'i blo yis gong gi rim pa ltar// yid dga'i gnas brten kun tu bzang po 
19b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ lam 'di bsgom par bya ba kho na'o// de ltar zhal gyi lung bsdus las byung dge ba dri med pa// kha ba zla ba'i 'od ltar rab tu dkar ba de yis ni// 'di don ma 'ongs 'gro ba skal ldan 'ga' dang 
19b6(rgyud 'grel): phrad gyur nas// rab tu dang ba'i dad pas len cing 'di mchog rab bsgoms shog/ blugs dang gtor dang dag par byas pas slob dpon cher 'gyur te// thams cad kun gyi rgyud 'dzin gzhan rnams rgyud 
19b7(rgyud 'grel): kun la sbyor ba'i// dang po'i rim pa rab rtogs dri ma rnams ni dag byas te// ye shes sgyu ma'i snod du rung bar rnal 'byor de 'gyur shog/ snying rje ldan pa'i bla ma'i zhabs la gus par rab ldan pas// ra bo/ 
19b8(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis rang rgyud rab tu smin byas te// zhing dag byas pas chos kun spyi sogs don du rab rtogs nas// byams pa la sogs bzhin du sems can kun gyi 'gro bar shog/ lhan cig byed 
20a1(rgyud 'grel): pas byin brlabs rje btsun thugs rje chen po yis// dga' ba rnyed pas chos kun dag pa'i ngo bo chen po mchog/ ji bzhin gnas pa'i don la mi bslu bcu drug thig le cha// ngal gas/ 
20a2(rgyud 'grel): las thob man ngag chen po rab tu rnyed par shog/ de rnyed de la sems ni yang dag rab tu mgu 'gyur bas// mgrin pa dma' bas brtags nas rang rig chos kyi sku ni yang dag thob// sku dang gsung 
20a3(rgyud 'grel): dang thugs dang dpag med sprul pa'i gzugs kyis ni// khams gsum bkang nas sems can thams cad srid las sgrol bar shog/ rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhes bya ba byang
20a4(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhal gyi lung // dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon chen po lha sangs rgyas dpal gyi ye shes zhabs kyis bsdus pa/ zhal nas zhal du brgyud pa rdzogs so// 
20a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la gu h+ya dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bskar cing zhus te gtan la pa ba pa'o// ha/ sh+ya sh+ya// sangs rgyas ye shes kyi nam rdza nas kyi gyu babs kyi na gnas gyi yang bcug so// 
20a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ mu kha A ga ma/ bod skad du/ zhal gyi lung / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan ral gri las byung gur gum mdog/ zhi ba'i zhal gsum phyag ni drug ldan zhing / 
20a7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyis 'khyud chu skyes la zhugs pa'i// dpal ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal nas// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rim pa'i gzhung lugs kyi// sgrub thabs bdag nyid dran phyir brtsam par 
20a8(rgyud 'grel): bya// 'jam dbyangs bde bar rtogs pa'i don du ni// rtog pa'i nga rgyal bde ba dang bral ba// sgra yi tshogs kyi sdeb sbyor bral dgongs pa// sbas rnams slob dpon zhabs kyis 'gro don du// gsal bar/ 
20b1(rgyud 'grel): sgra ji bzhin du bshad don to// sdeb sbyor yangs shing mtshan nyid dang bral zhing // gang yang don zab tshad mas shin tu sbas// blo dman rnams kyis de rtogs mi 'gyur ba'i// dpal ldan ye shes zhal 
20b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad sgrub thabs kyi// man ngag shin tu gsal bas bshad par bya// 'bad pa chen pos bla ma mnyes bya ste// shin tu sdug sogs khyad 'phags sbyin pa dang // gzhan yang mchog tu gyur 
20b3(rgyud 'grel): pas mchod byas na// 'dir ni 'dod pa'i bka' drin ster bar 'gyur// chu yi dbang dang cod pan ming dang ni// rdo rje dril bu zhes ni bshad pa dang // bum pa zhes bya mchog tu gsang ba dang // shes 
20b4(rgyud 'grel): rab zhes bshad lung bstan brtul zhugs dang // dbugs dbyung de rnams cho ga ji lta bar// rjes snang thob cing bla ma 'jam dbyangs dang // sngags pas bsrung ba'i thabs dang dam tshig dang / 
20b5(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu sdom pa la gnas mngon ldan pa// yang dag thob cing sa phyogs gtsang mnyam pa// yid du 'ong zhing chu yis chag chag btab// dri bzang nyi zla chu dang sman rnams kyis// rab byugs me tog 
20b6(rgyud 'grel): chal par bkram pa dang // gla rtsi gur gum tsan dan gyis mdzes pa// yang na sems kyis 'dir ni rnam par bsam// bde ba'i stan la rdo rje skyil krung bcas// sems can la brtse ting 'dzin dang
20b7(rgyud 'grel): por bsgom// ji srid pa 'di sangs rgyas ma lus gyur// de srid bdag gis skyil krung gzhig mi bya// ma lus 'gro tshogs sangs rgyas rnam bya zhes// de ltar smon lam khyad 'phags gnab par
20b8(rgyud 'grel): bya// 'gro ba cu dang mi rgyu thams cad dang // rang lus stong pa nyid du bsgom bya ste// rang lus lha yi ngo bo nyid du 'od gsal ba// rang gi sems tsam las byung blta bar bya// gang yang 'di ltar 
21a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge oM dang por// swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harma/ swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho tsi gsang sngags rgyal// mtha' zug brjod cing 'dir yang de 'og tu// rang gi snying gar a las zla ba bsgom// de dkyil 
21a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer tshogs ni ser po ma ma// khams gsum mun pa'i tshogs ni 'joms byed pa// rnam thar rnam gsum gyi sgo dag par 'gyur// oM shU n+ya tA zhes dang por rnam par thar// gzhan ni a mr-i ta ra 
21a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes su bshad// oM a pra ti hi taM sgra de rnams// 'dir bdag ye shes la sogs zhal gsum 'dod// des ni lha mig dag pa thob gyur nas// de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong // 
21a4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs gzhal yas khang byas dbus gnas pa'i// bla ma mgon po nam mkha' la gnas mchod// snying po'i sa bon gyis spos 'od zer tshogs// las byung gzugs sogs dgu po'i 
21a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid dang // me tog la sogs phyi rol rang gi mgon// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyis mchod bsam// rdzogs sangs 'khor lo'i spyan sngar sa la ni// pus btsugs dman pa'i
21a6(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis thal sbyar byas// dkyil 'khor mgon po mchod pas rab mchod cing // sdig pa bshags pa la sogs brjod par bya// bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // chags// 
21a7(rgyud 'grel): dang zhe sdang rnam par rmongs pa yis// srid pa nyam nga rnams su sdig bgyis pa// des na sdig de thams cad rab tu bshags// sdig pa bshags pa'o// sngon chad byas pa'i sdig pa bshags nas 
21a8(rgyud 'grel): kyang // slar yang de la 'jug par mi bgyid cing // byang chub snying po la gnas gyur gyi bar// rtag tu bdag gis bsod nams blo ldan shog/ sdom pa'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas mgon byang chub 
21b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' mchog/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis dge ba gang bgyis pa// de la'ang ba dag ni byang chub 'bras thob par// ma lus pa la bdag ni rjes yi rang // rjesu yi rang ba'o// legs 
21b2(rgyud 'grel): par gsungs chus bran pa'i bsod nams kyi// myug ni bdag gis rim thob 'phel ba yis// 'khor ba'i gdung bas bcom pa'i 'gro rnams la// yang dag byang chub shing bcos 'bras 
21b3(rgyud 'grel): bcas 'gyur// yongs su bsngo ba'o// rdzogs sangs rin chen rang gi sems gnas dang // rtog pa'i dra ba rab tu rnam bral chos// sa dbang sogs dang brtul zhugs dbang dge 'dun// 
21b4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dad pas rtag tu skyabs su mchi// gsum la skyabs su mchi ba'o// sdug bsngal tshogs kyis bsregs pa'i sems can kun// snying rje ldan pas byung kun gtong ba ni// dam chos 
21b5(rgyud 'grel): chu char rab bsregs 'joms pa yi// sangs rgyas sgrub ces rang sems bskyed par bya// byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o// sbyin pa la sogs bya bas skabs byas te// 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i
21b6(rgyud 'grel): sras rnams kun gyi lam// gshegs dang gshegs 'gyur 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dpal 'bras lam mchog de la bsten par bgyi// lam la brten pa'o// rgyal dang bdag nyid la skyes de 
21b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la// kun nas kun tu bdag nyid bdag gis dbul// sems dpa' mchog gis bdag nyid yongs bzung bas// dang bas khyed la 'bangs su mchi bar bgyi// bdag nyid dbul ba'o// / 
21b8(rgyud 'grel): glo bur nyon mongs tshogs chen gyis gdungs pa// bskyod pa'i skye bo mtha' med dgrol ba'i phyir// chos kyi bdud rtsi sngags rnams bshad pa ru// sman mchog mgon po la ni bdag bskul lo// 
22a1(rgyud 'grel): bskul ba'o// mchog tu mi dge bsam pas rab bcom pa'i// bdud kyi skye rgan dang 'chi ba las// mya ngan 'das bzhed gyur pa spangs nas su// mgon mchog bzhugs par 
22a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni gsol ba 'debs// gsol ba gad pa pa'o// tshigs bcad rdzogs byas legs zhes brjod nas ni// thub dbang tshogs rnams de nas mi snang gyur// hUM bsgoms nyi ma'i dkyil 
22a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dbus su ni// nam mkha' a dza na ri'i mdog ldan pa// de byung sna tshogs rdo rje'i nyi dkyil gnas// de las gtso bo'i sa bon 'od ldan pa// de las sna tshogs rdo rje'i sprin tshogs kyis/ 
22a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs rnams thams cad char gyis yongs su gang // de las phyogs brgyad rdo rje'i rang bzhin char // rab 'ab ba de yis dra bar sprul par dmigs// des ni sa bdun 'og la sogs 'phel
22a5(rgyud 'grel): nas// srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du mda' rnams so// steng gi sa bon gyur pas skad cig la// sna tshogs rdo rje yi ni bla re byung // 'od zer de tshogs mda' dang 'dra ba yis// nam mkha' khyab par 
22a6(rgyud 'grel): kun tu gdug su gyur yaM las byung ba'i rlung ni 'og tu bsam// gzhur byas 'od sngon rgyal mtshan gyis ni mtshan// b+he ram pa zhes bya ba dum bu min// 'gro ba'i snying po 'dzin 'gyur bzhag par// 
22a7(rgyud 'grel): bya// dbus su gru gsum 'bar ba rab dmar ba// raM gyi sa bon las byung phyogs gzhu 'dren// mthong nas de'i dbus su mtshams bcing bya// baM dkar las byung ba yi bum mtshan chu// de dbus
22a8(rgyud 'grel): laM las byung ba'i mdog ser po// ra ba'i don du gru bzhi dbang gi'o// hUM gis sna tshogs rdo rje byas sa phyogs// de dbus rabar rnal 'byor pa yis bya// 'di ni zhing rnam par dag pa'o// bruM ser 
22b1(rgyud 'grel): las byung 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'i// rtse mo'i 'od zer phyogs bcur spro bar bya// rtsibs rnams thams cad kyi ni lte ba'i phyogs// paM byung pad+ma'i steng du ra skyes nyi// legs gsungs rgyal ba 
22b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi skyed byed yaM// bruM byung ye shes rnams ni gang yin nyid// sdug bsngal la sogs bcu gcig rnams kyi phyir// nyi ma nyi ma'i steng du hUM dgod bya// ye shes bcu gcig bcas 'dir/ 
22b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo la// nyi ma la gnas hUM byung rdo rje sngo// lte ba'i pad+ma nyid zung rdo rje las// dpal ldan rdo rje hUM mdzad su ru gyur// yan lag kun ni dbu ma'o zhal dang 'dra// g.yas pa dkar zhing g.yon 
22b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhal yang dmar// shin tu 'jigs pa'i phyag drug 'jigs pa'i spyan// 'jigs pa'i bskal pa'i sprin 'dra sgra sgrogs pa// rig ma kun tu bzang mos yang dag 'khyud// phyag gnyis 
22b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni yan lag yongs su sdems// g.yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa dang // zhags pa lcags kyu lag pa g.yon gnyis 'dzin// g.yas pas u ma'i nu ma'i dkyil ma nan cing // g.yon 
22b6(rgyud 'grel): pas bde 'byung dregs pa'i mgo bo gnon// de bzhin zhabs kyi g.yas brkyang bzlog pa yis// gnas pa'i mgon po sku ni rab tu sgeg/ rtsibs re re la nyi ma bcu gnas pa'i// hUM byung mtshan
22b7(rgyud 'grel): ma 'dzin pa spro bar bya// bsdus na tho ba dbyug pa pad+ma dang // rdo rje de rnams dbang sogs phyogs gnas bskyed// skor phyogs su ni lcags kyu dbyug pa mdung // rdo rje me la sogs pa'i 
22b8(rgyud 'grel): mtsham su bskyed// 'khor lo dgra sta gnyis ni steng 'og tu// skyed par byed de khro bo'i zhal ldang dgod// gshin rje mthar byed gzhan gyis me thub dang // rta gdong bgegs kyi tshogs ni rnam 
23a1(rgyud 'grel): par 'joms// Tak+ki dbyug sngon dang ni stobs po che// khro bo mi g.yo gtsug tor gnod mdzes rgyal// gnyis ni dkar po rtag gdong dmar po ste// de bzhin gtsug tor 'khor lo 
23a2(rgyud 'grel): skyur ser po// bdun po gzhan dag kyang ni shin tu sngo// kun kyang nyi ma'i dkyil gnas rab tu grag/ g.yas pa'i pus mo'i tshigs ni shin tu bskum// g.yon pa'i brla dang rje ngar gnyis rab 
23a3(rgyud 'grel): brkyang // sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma'i steng du gnas// phyogs dbang lus ni ji lta ba bzhin mnan// be ta l+ya dze dri khro gnyer ral pa gcig/ g+ho na skul byed sa bzang mchog chen po// mud gzhags pa 
23a4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje mthar byed sogs// de rnams bcu po mnyam du lha mo bsten// 'khor lo'i gtso dang gtsug tor gnod mdzes dang // de bzhin mi g.yo 'dod pa'i rgyal po lnga// smar med cing de rnams cod
23a5(rgyud 'grel): pan ldan// yan lag rin chen rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// shin tu mdzes pa'i 'od sngon gyen du 'byung // khro dang bcas par bzhad pa'i zhal gsum ni// mche ba cung zad btsigs shing spyan 
23a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams dmar// shin tu mig zlum mi g.yo ba la sogs// yangs lta brdal brtan chos kun 'jigs med pa'o// gshin rje mthar byed gzhan gyis mi thub pa// dbyug sngon dang ni de bzhin rta mgrin 
23a7(rgyud 'grel): dang // stobs po che dang bgegs mthar byed bcas pa'i// drug po mig ser gzhan yang shin tu drag/ drag por lta bas sdang ba thams cad 'dul// gsus pa 'phyang zhing thung la mig kyang zlum// 
23a8(rgyud 'grel): shin tu lce bskyod khro gnyer 'jigs la drag/ smin ma g.yo zhing spyan bgrad zhal mche btsigs// khros pas rnam 'jigs ha ha zhes bzhad pa// smin ma sma ra ser zhing skra ser skya// cod pan med 
23b1(rgyud 'grel): cing rus pa sbrul gyis brgyan// rked pa'i phyogs su stag gi pags pa man pas// skad cig gis ni 'gro ba za mthur ldan// drag po 'di rnams mgo bo'i cod pa na ni// rigs ldan dang ni mtha' yas 
23b2(rgyud 'grel): mdog gnag gyur// 'jog po zhes klu gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// de bzhin du ni sna cha dag tu 'gyur// de bzhin pad+ma zhes pa gser btso'i mdog/ 'di rnams kyis mdzes mgul pa'i do shal gyur// 
23b3(rgyud 'grel): skabs na bad+hA rtsa ba 'ju kar ba// thugs ldan pa rnams kyim gyu byong gas// pad+ma mar ba 'dra ba na skyes // 'ad dpag dag d+hA ba cing byas// / dang pa d+mad ma dang / d+hA 
23b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis// pad 'dra pad+ma'i rkang gdub gnyis su byas// g.yas phyogs su ni 'khor lo myur bar 'khor// khro bo'i tshogs de rnams ni mi 'gul lta// rtsibs rnon po yis yongs bcad dum bu yi// 
23b5(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs sa phyogs bdud rnams slar mi skye// dkon mchog gsum la 'di ru sun 'byin 'gyur// de la gtso bo gnod mdzes spyi sngags kyis// da ni rnam par bzlog nas phyir phyogs su// khro bo'i
23b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs de rnams ni bskyod par byas// oM AHuSh+NI Sha badz+ra tsakra ban+ti sarba lo ki ka lo kot+ta ra yan+ta/ tan+ta mu la pra yo gI dI ni ma ma kri te ye na ke na tsi ta krita tA ni tA ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ tshin+da tshin+da/ mu ru mu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ ha na ha na 
23b7(rgyud 'grel): da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ kaM pa ya kaM pa ya/ bi d+hA na sa ya bi d+hA na sa ya/ sha ta sa ha srA/ bi tsur+N+Na ya bi tsur+N+Na ya/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya tsakra ban+ti/ bruM hUM/ de nas ji skad bshad pa'i bsgom pa'i rim pa yis/ dgongs ka lan 
23b8(rgyud 'grel): gsum sngags 'di bzlas par bya/ sdang bar sems par byed pa de yi ni/ de nyid kyis grub 'gyur te the tshom med// gshin rje mthar byed la sogs rang sprul pa// phyogs bcur gnas pa'i drag po spro bar bya/ de rnams 
24a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang sna tshogs yongs khyab pas// bgegs dbang rnams kyi mgul nas thag pas bcings// oM suM b+ha'i sngags ni zhal bzhi pas/ phyogs bzhi dag tu brjod nas bsrung bar bya// yongs su bsrungs nas khro 
24a2(rgyud 'grel): bo'i tshogs sprul pas// shin tu khro dang bcas pa'i sdang mig gis// gtso bo'i rdo rje thob dbyug sogs kyis// rang gi lus kun rab tu brdung bar 'gyur// mdun du zhags pas drangs shing bsdams nas ni// sna tshogs sa la 
24a3(rgyud 'grel): gdong yang sbyar bar byas// de nas 'od 'bar rdo rje phur bu yis// de steng rang gzugs ji lta bzhin du sprul// bsdus nas 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i bka' thob nas// khro dang bcas pa'i gnod mdzes lus kyis ni// lag pa g.yon pa kun tu/ 
24a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od ldan pas// snying rje med par khu tshur gyis bsdams te// bgegs tshogs de rnams mgon pos bsdus nas ni/ pur bu gad ba/ oM b+ha g+ha g+ha ta ge na dang / oM badz+ra la sogs bzlas pa'i tho ba yis// nam mkha' bsdams shing khro 
24a5(rgyud 'grel): drag lnga stad kyis// lag pa g.yas pas shin tu brdung bar bya// yongs su bsrung ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// de nyid gsum gyi sa bon dkar dmar gnag/ mgo dang zhabs su ho ser gnyis dkyil bcug/ nam mkha'i phyogs nas nor 
24a6(rgyud 'grel): bu bzhin lhung sa// kha yi nang nas nang du rab tu zhugs// de nas snying rje ldan pas gzugs brtag pa// dngos po sdig tu dbang po'i gzhu rang bzhin// bsgoms nas bdag med rang bzhin bsams nas ni// shA n+ya la sogs sngags 
24a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams brjod par bya// marig pa'o// skad cig de la kha yi nang du zhugs// 'khor lo 'byung bas zla ba'i gzugs su gyur// de dbus hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje dmar// pra hUM rdo rje las byung kun tu bzang // zhal gsum de rnams 
24a8(rgyud 'grel): kyini gnyis 'gyur phyag/ zhal ni gangs ri'i mdog 'dra gnag dang dmar// rdo rje ral g.yas nor bu pad+ma g.yon// phyag gnyis kyis ni rang gi rig ma 'khyud// g.yas pas g.yas min brla yi rgyab mnan cing // g.yon pas 
24b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa yongs su mnan pa yis// sna tshogs pad+ma lan skyil krung bcings// rdzogs sangs rgyas bcas 'og steng phreng ba 'phro// kun tu bzang las byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings// rdo rje gsum stong dkar po'i gru 
24b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum ste// hUM ser gyis sprul zab mo dbus su ni// paM ser de las byung ba'i sna tshogs pad// pad steng kham ljang de las byung ba yi// sna tshogs rdo rje phyogs bcur rigs 'od 'gyed// rdo rje'i steng byung 'khor lo 
24b3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po rtsibs bcu gnyis// rten 'brel las ni kun tu byung ba yi// phyag g.yas 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad kyis mtshan pa'i// rig bcas rnam par snang mdzad blta bar bya// kun tu bzang po'i rang gzugs ji lta bzhin// 'di 
24b4(rgyud 'grel): yi 'od zer mkha'i dbyings nam spros pas// mnar med me chen la sogs rnam par ni// sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa phun tshogs grub// de bsum bdag nyid slebs bon la// spro bsdu yang byas las byung sangs rgyas sku// 
24b5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rigs kyi bye brag tha dad pa'i// rgyal ba'i sku las byung ba'i sna tshogs 'od// mthu yis de la dkyil 'khor dag tu gyur// zur ba'i pa la shin tu mdzes par byas// de la sgo rnams de bzhin rta babs khyams// zla ba dra 
24b6(rgyud 'grel): byed rin chen mdzes rnams dang // rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan dril bu dang // ye shes dam pa bsod nams tshegs gnyis kyi// bco ma'i gser gyi rang bzhin bum pa bzang // mdzes pa rnams kyi nang dang phyi rol bzhag/ 
24b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rdo rje byed pa rtse lngas brgyan// sna tshogs g.yer ka dril bu'i sgra rnams dang // me long dang bcas rnga yab rnams kyis brgyan// 'khor lo rin chen chu skyes ral gris mtshan// ka ba brgyad can de ni rnam dgu ldan// sgo yi 
24b8(rgyud 'grel): phyogs gnyis kyi ni ka ba ni// ri dgas gnyis dbus chos kyi 'khor lo'o// rdo rje 'dzin pas 'khor lo byas shing zlum// de yi phyi rol kun tu 'od tshegs 'khyil// 'du byed do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 
25a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// nyi shur gcig gis ma tshang de rnams kyi// paM las byung ba'i sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan// 'gro ba ma lus nye bar 'khrul pas na// rnam par dag pa'i pad+ma'i gdan 
25a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams yin// raM las byung ba'i nyi ma bdun du gyur// oM las byung ba'i rgyas pa'i zla bcu gnyis// nyon mongs thams cad nges par bsreg pa'i phyir// rnam par dag pa'i nyi ma bdun du gyur// bsod nams kun gyi myu 
25a3(rgyud 'grel): gu bskyed pa'i phyir// zla ba'i gdan rnams dag ni byung ba yin// dbus su zla ba dbang po'i phyogs su'ang zla// yongs su lhag pa'i phyogs su'ang nyi ma gsum// zur bzhi mtshams su'ang zla ba'o// rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba 
25a4(rgyud 'grel): nye bar mdzes// phyi rol zur bzhi dang ni mtshams rnams dang // shar gyi sgo yi g.yon dang g.yas gnyis su// so so so so yi ni zla ba'i gzugs// sgo rnams de nyid du ni nyi ma bzhi// de bzhin dbus su zla ba'i steng du ni// zla ba'i
