25a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gnyis ni rnam par bsgom// g.yon pa'i zla 'dir yi ge bcu drug sogs// g.yas pa'i zla gyur ka sogs ha mthar thug/ zla bcas de la wa ya la gsum dang // a ka pa oM de la rab tu sbyar// de dag rnams ni 
25a6(rgyud 'grel): nyis 'gyur rnams su bya// gang gyur de gnyis A li kA li zla// lugs su byung dang lugs las bzlog par bshad// dbyangs yig rnam dkar phreng ni gnyis su gyur// pha rol gsal byed rnams ni 'di ru dmar// de gnyis dbus/ 
25a7(rgyud 'grel): su raM ni rnam par bsam// zhu bas gnyi ga gcig gyur 'od kyi tshogs// 'od tshogs hUM byung hUM las rdo rje dmar// de yi dbus su zla gyur sa bon steng // zla hUM rdo rje las byung zla dbus su// ye shes rang bzhin las byung rdzogs par 
25a8(rgyud 'grel): gyur// sbrul sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang zhing // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yang dag spras// me long ye shes la sogs nang du ni// sngags rnams lnga po 'di dag legs par sbyar// oM sogs tsi ta pra ti bya d+haM ka/ de srid 
25b1(rgyud 'grel): mtha' mar de bzhin legs par brjod// kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gzhan gyur pa// zla gnyis 'dus gyur pa yi rnam snang mdzad// me long ye shes rang bzhin de gcig go/ nyon mongs yid kyi rnam shes gzhan gyur pa// / 
25b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od tshogs gang yin de yang rin chen 'byung // de ni ye shes gnyis pa mnyam nyid gyur// rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gzhan gyur pa// hUM byung rdo rje 'dzin pa 'od dpag med// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes 'di gsum pa// 
25b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa gzhan gyur pa// rdo rje'i dbus kyi sa bon don yod grub// bya ba nan tan grub 'di bzhi pa yin// rang gi rnam par shes pa gzhan gyur pa// ye shes rnam bzhi rang bzhin gang yin gcig/ de ni/ 
25b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lnga par 'di ru bshad// spro dang bsdu ba thams cad las byung ba'i// rnam dag gnyis med chos dbyings rdo rje sems// zhal gsum dbus dang yan lag thams cad dkar// g.yas dang g.yon gnyis zhal 
25b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas kya dang dam pa// dza la thegs se nga na d+mag // b+hag gnyis kyis ni rigs 'byung ba la// zhes pathams cad 'bregs pas pan+d+haH// sus ma gas nag kyi 'aM// grub 
25b6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi ni bsam pa rnams// yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ni rin chen no// 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang 'dam kun gyi// ma gos par gyur pa'i phyir ni pad+ma'o// 'di ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa'o// srid gsum 
25b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten de ni nang gnas shing // dngos po thams cad ro gcig chos kyi dbyings// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yum// mtshan ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// 'dod chags la sogs kyis gdungs chus 
25b8(rgyud 'grel): khengs pa'i// 'gro ba chu bo bzhi yis kun tu 'das// nga rgyal la sogs dpa' rlabs pha rol ngogs// thag ring klong du las kyi rlung gis shin tu bdas// byams pa phun sum tshogs pa'o// sems can 'khor bas gdung 
26a1(rgyud 'grel): pa mthong nas ni// snying rje'i ting 'dzin rgya cher bskyed par bya// thabs dang rig pa dgyes pa'i sgra rnams kyis// mkha' la sangs rgyas sems can dgyes pa bskyed// 'od zer dra spros pas ni drangs pa'i/ 
26a2(rgyud 'grel): mgon po rnams// kha yi dra bas nang du gzhug par bya// zhu gyur rdo rje lam byung gsang byung 'gyur// phyin gnas pa'i lha mo rnam pa dgu// rim bzhin spos dang bdug pa mar med pa// dri dang de bzhin me long la sogs lnga// 
26a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa bya phyir lag na thogs par blta// lha mo rnams dang rang nyid rdo rje sems// dang po spyan la sogs pa spro bar bya// gzugs la sogs pa lha mo kun kyang 'byung // slar bcug thams cad rdo rje lam phyung nas// pad+ma/ 
26a4(rgyud 'grel): sgo ru nges par 'bab 'gyur te// gsang ba'i lte ba'i zla dbus gzhug par bya// 'od zer de byung bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// bskyed nas srid pa gsum na gnas pa yi// sems can gang yin thams cad gzhug par
26a5(rgyud 'grel): bya// snying rje phun sum tshogs pa'o// rdo rje bcom nas pad+ma legs phye ba'i// de yi 'od kyis sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas// khar gzhug rdo rje lam ni byung gyur pa// rgyal ba la sogs zla ba zhus dbang bskur// mig la sogs
26a6(rgyud 'grel): pa drug dang gzugs rdo rje// spyan la sogs dang bde bar gshegs pa lnga// de bzhin gzhan yang khro bo bzhi rnams dang // de dag rnams ni rang gi gzugs su gyur// dga' ba phun sum tshogs pa'o// stong gsum chen po'i 
26a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten khams gnas gyur// phyi rol sems can gzhan dag dga' med pa// kI la sogs pa'i sa bon gyis spro ste// de rnams thams cad byang chub la gzhol byas// gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o// sems 
26a8(rgyud 'grel): can don du smon lam byas gyur pa// gang yin de ni bdag gis yongs su bkang // 'gro ba mya ngan 'das par 'dral don phyir// stong pa nyid du rab gzhug bzhed par gyur// rnam par shes pa'o// btang snyoms 
26b1(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rdzogs pa'o// oM dang aHhUM dkar zhing dmar dang gnag/ 'od ser ho gnyis kyi ni dbus gnas pa// kha yi nang bzhugs pad+ma'i dbus gnas te/ mgon po rig ma gnyi ga zhu bar byas// 'das dang ma byon pa dang
26b2(rgyud 'grel): da ltar gyi// sems can dag tu gyur pa gang cung zad// de rnams rgyu gang gis ni yongs grol ba'i// mgon po bzhugs pa stong nyid rab zhugs gyur// gang rnams thog ma med pa'i dus dbus bsgom// thogs med dus 
26b3(rgyud 'grel): mtha' nas ni mi g.yo ba'i// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi gzugs kyi lha mo rnams// rdo rje thugs khyod la sogs pa bzhi yis// rang gi glu rnams kyi ni yang dag bskul// rdo rje rdzogs la stong nyid yang dag spangs// maM bsam snga 
26b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gyur// sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i gdan dbus su// zla ba bcu gnyis dang ni nyi ma bdun// de dbus pad+ma zla ba'i gdan dbus su// maM las byung ba'i ral gri rnam par bsam// ral gri steng du yang ni 
26b5(rgyud 'grel): zla mi ste// ral gri bla maM las byung 'jam rdoH// ming dang gzugs so// rang gi zhal dang nga gi gung gum mdog/ g.yas bsngo zhing g.yas pa min pa dkar// ral gri mda' dang ut+pal gzhu rnams shing // de yi phyag gnyis shes 
26b6(rgyud 'grel): rab kun tu 'gyud// shes rab rnam dag ngo bo ral gri ste// chos rnams 'bigs par byed pa nyid kyis ni// rnam par dag pa'i thabs kyi ngo bo mda'// sems can thams cad tshim par byed pas na// ut+pal sngon po nyes kun// 
26b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyen po dang // yon tan thams cad 'dzin par byed pa'i ga'u// rnam pa sna tshogs mchog rnams kyis brgyan cing // yid du 'ong ba'i rin chen mchog gis brgyan// sangs rgyas lngar byas bdag nyid lus la spro// ri rab bzhin 
26b8(rgyud 'grel): du mi g.yo dpal gyis mdzes// rang gi sa bon dkyil 'khor dbus su 'am// yang na gzhan ci 'dod pa'i tshogs mgon// de nyid kyis ni gnas su gyur pa ste// dkyil 'khor dbang po de yi gzugs 'dzin 'gyur// gzung 
27a1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang ni 'dzin pa'i sems nyid med// oM d+harmA d+hA tu la sogs sngags brjod de// brjod pa tsam gyis rdzogs par gyur pa ni// de 'dir bsnyen pa'i yan lag rdzogs byas pa'i// mig gnyis nang dang rna ba
27a2(rgyud 'grel): sna dang lce// yan lag dam pa brang dang zla gnas drug/ k+ShaM dz+r-i de bzhin khaM gaM de nas yaM// shAM saM yi ge drug nyid rnam par bsgom// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // ral gri dang ni rdo rje rim bzhin du// phyag mtshan de rnams 
27a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag byung ba dang // mtshan ma de rnams dbus su zla sa bon// phyag mtshan zla ba sa bon bcas byung ba'i// yan lag sa bon dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan rig/ drug po brla gnyis rdo rje skyil krung gis// zla bcas sna tshogs
27a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma kun tu gnas// sa dbang rdo rje'i dbang po lag na rin// 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrib sel kun tu bzang // dkar dang sngo dang de bzhin ser dang dmar// ljang dang skya dang gzhan yang de la sogs// sa yi dbang phyug gzugs// 
27a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje 'khyud// rdo rje dbang po yang ni sgra rdo rjes// nam mkha'i snying po'i dri yi rdo rjes 'khyud// 'jig rten dbang phyug dang ni ro yis te// sgrib pa rnam par sel ba reg pas 'khyud// chos kyis 'khyud pa yang ni kun tu bzang // 
27a6(rgyud 'grel): de rnams bcu gnyis phyi nang dbye ba las// skye mched de rnams rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs rdor la sogs lha mo de dag rnams// gang yin phun tshogs skye mched dkyil 'khor gnas// de dag rnams la 'khyud 'gyur de
27a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// bzlog pas gnas tshe thams cad de bzhin gyur// de bzhin rtag tu bsgom pa bsgom bdag nyid// skad cig la ni mngon shes drug thob 'gyur// pha rol phyin drug rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor par// gyur te nye ba yi ni sgrub 
27a8(rgyud 'grel): pardzogs// reg pa'o// rdo rje gsum rdzogs nges par gnas don du// zla gsum snying gzhog ma mgo bor yang // brang dang lkog ma'i bar du bzhi pa dgod// sna tshogs pad+ma rgyas pa'i dbus gnas pa'i// hUM gis rdo rje las 
27b1(rgyud 'grel): byung thugs rdo rje// a yi pad+ma las byung khyad 'phags ngag/ oM gyi 'khor lo yis ni sku rdo rje// maM gi ral gri las byung 'jam rdo rje// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa sprul pa yi// sku gsum rnam par grol ba'i bdag 
27b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid de// nges dbyings ye shes rang bzhin bzhi pa'o// sngon po dmar po dang ni dkar dang ser// dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya che// ngag rdo rje'i sku 'khyud chos phyag rgya// dam pa'i sku yi rdo rje las phyag rgya// 'jam
27b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs nyid 'khrud dam tshig phyag rgya'o// de rnams bzhi po zla ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// rdo rje'i skyil krung gis kyang shin tu gnas// phyag rgya rnams kyi so so'i dbus su ni// 'di ltar bsgom par bya zhes la la 'chang // de rnams 
27b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi ni dbus su 'di lta yang // raM baM yaM laM la sogs yi ge dgod par bya// 'di rnams bzhi po rdzogs par gyur pa dang // me chu rlung dang dbang gi dkyil 'khor rnams// dmar po gru gsum dkar zhing zlum pa dang // gzhu 'od sngon 
27b5(rgyud 'grel): po ser po gru bzhi pa'o// mdung dang bum pa ba dan rdo rje yis// go rim ji bzhin de rnams mtshan par 'dod// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su rang sa bon dmar ba phyag mtshan zla ba la gnas nyis 'gyur bya// mdog dang phyag
27b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rnams dang gdan la sogs// thugs rdo rje dang 'dra bar de rdzogs bya// rig ma spangs shing phyag gnyis zhal gcig ste// cod pan mtshon cha rgyan med de rnams ni// sngar gsungs dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ni// 
27b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsgom par bya zhes gzhan rnams 'chad// sems kyi 'od zer tshogs las rang byung ba'i// shes rab yan lag gis 'khyud gsal ba'i thugs// rgyal ba'i dbang po'i zhing rnams yang dag mchog/ rang gis lus
27b8(rgyud 'grel): ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab// dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang zhes thugs brjod de// chos kyi gsung lam zhes bshad gsung brjod de// de bzhin dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang sku ste// de ltar sngags brjod 'di ni sgrub yan lag/ sngags/ 
28a1(rgyud 'grel): / spangs brjod de sems kyis dbang bskur te// dpal ldan ye shes sems dpa' rtag tu bskul// gang phyir 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyud gsungs// shes rab rno can de rnams kyis rab sgrub// tshor ba'o// bdag gis 
28a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag snying ye shes 'od tshogs kyis// mkha' bzhugs rgyal ba ma lus yang dag bskul// de yi lus nang byung ba'i 'od zer las// gzugs sogs rdo rje rang byung gzhan yang ni// dpal ldan mA ma kI dang gos dkar
28a3(rgyud 'grel): can// sgrol ma zhes bya lha mo de rnams ni// rnga yi sgra ldan rnams kyi sgra sgrogs shing // byug pa la sogs me tog phreng thogs shing // gser gyi bum pa ye shes chus gang ba// bkra shis bum pa lag thogs glu rnams kyis// rang gtso 
28a4(rgyud 'grel): tsad pan thogs shing mkhas dkyil gnas// mchog tu dbang bskur bar ni dbab par bya/ bab 'gyur de nyid las ni byung ba yi// mi bskyod rdo rje cod pan dag du gnas/ mthang na shin tu sems ni rnam dag par// gyur pa de nyid sgrub pa 
28a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po'o// srid pa'o// rig ma mtshan mchog yon tan kun ldan pa// rang gi sa bon las byung kun tu brtag/ dkyil 'khor mngon sum du ni rab tu bzhag/ de la bzhen pa la sogs des byas bdag/ sa snying la sogs rnams kyis gang 
28a6(rgyud 'grel): bar blta// sku la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum gyi lus// de 'dir chos la sbyar bar gyur pa yis// glo bur las byur lus ni kun tu dgang // mgo snying lte brked pa brla gnyis su// oM hUM swA aHhA zhes go rim bzhin// 
28a7(rgyud 'grel): de rnams mdog ni bye brag shes nas ni// rnam dgod rigs lnga ru ni rab tu bya// a las byung ba'i gsang ba'i lte bar ni// hUM las sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi// nor bu oM dang rang gi rdo rje hUM// sbubs gnyis su ni yi ge/ 
28a8(rgyud 'grel): paphaT bsgom bya// de 'og oM sarba ta thA ga ta zhes// a ru rA ga na 'khyud gnyis su bya// len pa'o// de nas sngar bshad dbang bkur shes byas nas// rig dang lhan cig 'di rwa dga' bar bya// srid pa'o// dang por bsnyen 
28b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yan lag de nas nyer sgrub pa// sgrub pa'i yan lag chen po la sogs kyang // rdul po la sogs sbyor byas so sor ni// 'gyur te bzhi ru yang ni bshad par grags// rdul sogs rgya mthun rnam smin skyes bu byed// dbang // 
28b2(rgyud 'grel): gi 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi ru bzhag/ bsnyen pa'i yan lag nas brtsams bya ba nas// thabs las byung ba'i bya ba rnam pa bzhi// shes rab kyis 'gyur de bzhin cho ga rnams// bsnyen pa'i yan lag la sogs dbang bskur mtha'// / 
28b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu mthun la sogs bcas pa dbus kyi ming // yan lag bzhir 'gyur dang po'i sbyor ba'o// snying ga'i zla dbus gnas pa'i sngags 'od kyis// rgyal ba'i dbang po'i sku la ma lus gzhug/ bde ba chen po las byung byang chub
28b4(rgyud 'grel): sems// hUM rdor las byung dkyil 'khor dkyil dbang dgod// skye ba'o// dwe Sha ra ti bcas pa'i thugs rdo rje// in+d+ra nI la bcas byas lus 'chang zhing // zhe sdang rdo rje ngo bo sna tshogs pad+ma la// bzhugs pa'i badz+ra d+h+r-i ka ni zla dbus 
28b5(rgyud 'grel): su// rga shi'o// bruM 'khor las ni dzi na dzi ka gtso bo// rnam par snang mdzad gti mug 'dra rang bzhin// zla ba bye ba yi ni 'od gsal ba// shar phyogs zla dbus mo ha ra tir bcas// oM gyi rin chen las byung gser btso'i 'od// rin 
28b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang mgon po badz+ra ra tir bcas// nga rgyal gtso bo rat+na d+h+r-ika ces pa// 'di gdan nyi ma'i steng bzhugs lho phyogs su// dz+riM gi pad+ma las byung mtshal mdog 'od// 'dod chags la bzhugs mgon po 'od dpag med// rA ga ra
28b7(rgyud 'grel): tis dam 'khyud a ro li ka/ nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs 'gyur nub phyogs su// khaM gi ral gri las byung mdog mchog ldang // phrag dog rang bzhin de yang don yod grub// nu ma gnyis bsten badz+ra ra tir bcas// pra dz+nyA d+h+r-ika 
28b8(rgyud 'grel): ces byang phyogs nyid dbus su// ye shes lnga bud rnam par dag pa'o// lam gyi 'khor lo las byung mtshams su ni// rnam par snang mdzad mdog 'dra zla dkyil nas// sgeg pa'i cha byad rgyal la rab tu chags// mo ha ra ti gang 
29a1(rgyud 'grel): yin de nyid spyan// maM gi ut+pal dmar po'i phyag mtshan byung // mi bskyod pa 'dra ga shin rje'i phyogs zla dbus// rtag tu dang po'i sangs rgyas thabs gcig sbyor// dwe Sha ra ti mA ma kI gzhan min// paM gi 
29a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma las byung zla dbus su// snang ba mtha' yas mdog 'dra rlung gi phyogs// pad+ma'i mgon po yis ni kun tu 'byung // gos dkar gang yin rA ga ra ti'ang te// taM gi ut+pal gser las byung gyur pa// rin dbang 'od 
29a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra badz+ra ra ti sgrol// dpal ldan phyogs su zla ba lda gnas shing // don yod rdo rje'i yan lag gis 'khrur byas// 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnam par dag pa'o// phyi rol byung nas me yi phyogs su ni// nir phyogs de nyid kyi ninang du ba// 
29a4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba drug dbus rang gi phyag mtshan chu// 'od ldan yi ge drug po mthong nas ni// mtshams de rnams su dza hUM baM ho dang // kha ra shar gyi sgor gyur phyogs gnyis su// me long pi paM dkar po dri dung chos/ ro yi snod yang sna tshogs gos 
29a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dbyings// sa bo na bsams pa'i mtshan ma de mthong nas// gzugs rdo rje sogs lha mo de rnapas drag/ de rnams sa bon la sogs mdoga'ang zhing // lus la rtag tu de nyid gsum bas ma bya// pha rol byin drug rnam par dag 
29a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// ra hA nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// hUM gis bon mtshan byung khro ba'i gzugs// ji skad bshad pa'i khro bo'i tshogs nang gnas// bsgom bya de rnams rtag tu g.yas brkyang bzlog/ mya ngan 'das srid rnam dag 
29a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang ba'o// gshin rje mthar byed dbang po zhes bya'i sgor// shes rab mthar byed nyi ma la skyes phyogs// pad+ma mthar byed klu yi gtso bo'i phyogs// bgegs mthar byed pa rnam thos phyogs na gnas// dad pa la sogs 
29a8(rgyud 'grel): babazhi rnam par dag pa'o// gshin te mthar byed de'i be ta li// shes rab mthar byed gzhan gyis mi thub ma// pad+ma mthar byed lhan cig thog nyer can// bgegs mthar byed pa ral pa gcig mar dmigs// ma lus 'khor la 
29b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pad+ma la// nyi zla'i dbus ji lta ba bzhin bzhugs// zhi ba'i gzugs can gang yin 'dir lha rnams// de rnams thams cad rdo rje skyil krung gyur// ting 'dzin chen po thob pas shin tu zhi// bdud rnams bzhi las 
29b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu rgyal gyur pas// rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje skyil krung ngo // sangs rgyas sogs gzhan lha mo rnams bcas pa// dgyes pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnam par sbyar// dbus na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gtso bo yi// 
29b3(rgyud 'grel): zhal 'di rnams kyi zhal ni nges par blta// rigs rnams dang po'i rigs ni rdo rje'i rigs// de bzhin gshegs dang rin chen rigs gsum pa// de nas pad+ma'i rigs ni bzhi pa ste// sna tshogs rigs ni la lar las kyi rigs// 
29b4(rgyud 'grel): sngon po la sogs gang yin mdog lnga yang // de mdog tha dad pas ni rigs rnams lnga// sems can bsam pa tha dad mdog tha dad// rigs las rang byung sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku// de rnams yan lag mchog rnams gsum 
29b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgyan// sku gsung thugs ni rnam dag zhal gsum pa'o// sngon po dkar po gnyis kyis g.yon pa dmar// g.yas pa gnyis mdog rnam par zlog pa'o// ser bo dang ni dmar po ljang gu'i sku// g.yas min dang ni g.yas pa 
29b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar dang sngo// rigs kyi lha mo 'di dag rnams kyi ni// zhal gyi mdog rnams kyang ni so sor gyur// de rnams phyag drug dang ni yang dag ldan// gtso bo'i phyag gnyis kyis ni mtshan cha spangs// lag pa gnyis kyis 
29b7(rgyud 'grel): rdorje khu tshur ni// so so so sor nges bcings de 'og tu// mthe'u chung rtse mo lcags kyu'i gzugs kyis ni// lag pa gnyis kyis mkhrig ma gnyis ni sbyar// gnas ldan gang yin la ni phyi rol gyis// de yi phar 
29b8(rgyud 'grel): dbus 'dug 'gyur des mgul phyogs// g.yon pa'i nang du lag gnyis phyi rol gyur// gcig la gcig 'khyud phyag rgya bcing bar bya// pha rol byin drug rnam dag phyag drug po// bka te ne pa ka traM pa ri/ 
30a1(rgyud 'grel): / tsum pa ma na// ran+te shra na taM pa ri g+hi sha ma na// thabs dang rig pa'i yan lag mi byed par// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rgyal po'i rnam par bsgom// ngo bo nyid kyis rnam dag 'khyud pa'o// gang yang phyag 
30a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mchog las byung gang yin// mtshan ma mchog de lag pa g.yas su ste// phyag gsum thams cad la ni ral gri'o// ral gri las byung 'khor lo 'dzin 'gyur te// rin chen rigs kyi g.yon pa pad+mar gyur// de pad+ma 
30a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi rin chen te// 'di gnyis kyi ni gsum par 'khor lor gyur// gzhan rnams kun gyi lag pa nor bu pad+ma// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa dang // shes rab pha rol rnam dag phyag mtshan no// rgyal ba lnga po rnams 
30a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi ral pa'i tshogs// 'dir ni de rnams bye brag gcig yod 'gyur// zhi ba rnams ni rin 'bar cod pan thogs// khro bo rnams ni sbrul gyis sku brgyan cing // dpung pa lag ngar rked pa rkang pa dag/ mgrin pa dang ni rna ba mgor 
30a5(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa// 'od ldan nor bus spras pas gser gyis bcings// ji lta ji ltar yan lag rgyan gyis brgyan// thabs kyir gyur pa gang yin shes rab kyi// phyag dang mdog dang mtshon cha gos 'byung ba// gnas dang gnas pa nyid kyi 
30a6(rgyud 'grel): gang dang gang // de rnams kyang ni bar gyur pa yir gyur// dkyil 'khor 'di ni gsang 'gyur rnam par bsam// byung nas de yang go rim ji lta bzhin// yig gsum badz+ra d+h+r-ika sogs sngags rnams kyis// dam tshigs la sogs 
30a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang thabs gcig bya// mi bskyod rdo rje snying gar thugs rdo rje// rab zhugs nam mkha' dang mnyam ngo bo nyid// rnam par snang mdzad la sogs gzhan rnams kyang // gsang ba'i nang bshad gang yin phyogs rnams su'o// de dbus sngags 
30a8(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'od zer rnam byung nas// gshin rje mthar byed ltar gyur nam mkhar gnas// rdo rje lcags kyus 'khor lo drangs nas ni// de nas mdun gyi dkyil 'khor dag tu bya// rdzogs nas yon chab mchog bkang bad+ma'i snod// lag pa 
30b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis kun tu bzung nas kyang // de nas lag pa g.yon pas ba dan bzung // lag pa g.yas pa yis ni tsan dan mdzes// me tog chu sogs kyis mdzes bdud rtsi lnga// rang gi snying sogs bzlas pa'i mchod pa 
30b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bul// gshin rje mthar byed la sogs thams cad kyang // dza zhes lhag par smra zhing spang bar byed// de bzhin khro gzhan rang gi las kyi mtha'// hUM ba ho bcas pa yi sgra sgrogs shing // gzhan gyis mi thub pad+ma 
30b3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs mthar byed// rab bzhugs bcing ba dang ni dgyes par byed// zhes pa'i bar gyur 'di ltar lhag bsnyen pa// lhag pa'i rgyu mthun 'bras bu dang lhan cig/ de nas thams cad kun tu dgyes pa dang // mig 
30b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i yan lag byin gyis brlab// sku sogs tshig gsum gyis ni byin brlabs te// dbang bskur byas pa'i dus kyi mtha' bar gnas// de rnams rim gyis gnas pa'i bar du ni// lhag pa'i 'bras// 
30b5(rgyud 'grel): bu gsum bcas yan lag go/ rang gi sems las kun 'byung 'od chen 'phros// nam mkha'i rgyal dang rig ma kun nas drangs// nam mkha' khyab par gdan la bzhugs par gyur// rang gi bdag po bcings 
30b6(rgyud 'grel): nas cod pan bcings// gshin rje mthar byed pad mthar rdo rje gzhan// khro bo bgegs sgra rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas// nga rgyal bzhi po sems bdag 'jam dbyangs bcas// kun tu bzang dang phyag na rdo rje dang // 
30b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' chos dbyings dang // dpal ldan deSha rang bcas swa rdo rje// 'di rnams cod pan rdo rje mi bskyod pa// mi bstod rdo rje'i steng du rdo rje sems// sa snying ska dbang dang ni gzugs rdoH/ 
30b8(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje mthar byed mo ha ra ti rnams// 'di rnams kyi ni spyi bor rnam snang bzhugs// mkha' snying dri yi steng du rin chen tog/ ngag rdor 'jig rten dbang phyug dri dang ro// pad mthar phyin rnams cod pan 'od dpag 
31a1(rgyud 'grel): med// reg rdor sgrib sel badz+ra ra ti rnams// spyi bor yang ni don yod grub pa bzhugs// rang gi sa bon pad+ma'i nang gnas pa'i// 'od kyis kyang ni phyag rgya lnga drangs nas// kha yi nang zhugs gsang ba'i dbus 
31a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas te// zhu nas de las gzugs la sogs par gyur// sku rdor la sogs mtshan ma de lha mo// me long sogs gang yin de las byung spros// gzhan yang phyi rol me tog bdug spos sogs// de rnams nam mkha' la 
31a3(rgyud 'grel): nigadugs bzhin gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dang / b+hu dza la sogs sgra yi sngags brjod cing // mi bskyod rdo rje la sogs tshigs bcad lnga// brjod nas de nas mdun du rnam bsam pa// yaM las byung ba'i 'od sngon gzhur 
31a4(rgyud 'grel): byas nyid// rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// de nas raM byung shin tu mdog dmar ba'i// gru gsum gyen gnas me yi tshogs kyis mnan// de nas me yi steng du 'od dmar aM// de las byung ba'i pad+ma'i 
31a5(rgyud 'grel): snod mchog bsam// rnam pa bco lnga rdzas kyis yongs gang ba'i// bdud rtsi lnga la sa bon lnga rnams kyis// oM hUM zla ba gnyis ni mkha' dkyil gnas// zhu nas de yi nang du lhung bar gyur// skol bas oM ni tshur gyur 
31a6(rgyud 'grel): kun tu blta// hUM gi sa bon las byung rdo rje nang // rdo rjes dkrugs pas rnam par zhu gyur pa// yi ge hUM bzlas ye shes bdud rtsir gyur// de las gzhan pa yi ni snod rnams kun// thams cad rang gi lag na thogs par spro/ 
31a7(rgyud 'grel): lce yi rtse mor hUM byung rdo rje dkar// snying la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rgyal// thams cad kun tu tshim par bsam par bya// dkyil 'khor dam pa'i mchog 'gyur ting 'dzin no// gang yang 'jam dbyangs rdo rje
31a8(rgyud 'grel): thugs ka yi// sems dpa'i snying po las byung 'jam ral gri// maM las byung ba'i sems kyi mi bsgoms te// rdo rje gsum sku dang yang mnyam por byung // de rnams snying nas rang mtshan sa bon las// byung nas ye shes 
31b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer rab gsal ba'i// 'od kyis ma lus sna tshogs kun tu gang // ye shes bdud rtsi rgyun gyi rjes song nas// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad rgal nas kyang // rnal 'byor bdud rtsi gzhan dang gzhan bsdus nas// 
31b2(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu gdong ltas nas ni de byung bas// skad cig gis ni 'jig rten gsum bcas rgyal// ma lus sna tshogs sangs rgyas nyid byas nas// 'ongs nas spyi bo'i nang du rab tu zhugs// lus kun tshim par kun tu gyur 
31b3(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// thang gcig de la yang ba'i rang bzhin gyur// de nyid gsum mchod cho ga bzhin du bya// maM gi nang du rab zhugs rnam par blta// maM las byung gyur ral gri dbus su ni// zla gnas tsa na ka tsam thig ler gnas// 
31b4(rgyud 'grel): dedabus dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po// nyi shur gcig gis ma tshang de rnam dag/ gang dang gang gis skyo med de bsgoms te// mngon sum byas nas thig le'i sbyor ba'o// rang gi lha yi sa bon las byung 'od 'bros 
31b5(rgyud 'grel): pas// phyi rol gyi ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// chos 'byung zhes bya'i sna yi rtse mor bzhugs// yang dag byang chub sems byung 'jam ral gri// yang na 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje 'am// nas kyi tshad dam zla ba'i dbus 
31b6(rgyud 'grel): su ni// de yi steng du maM byung mdog lnga pa'i// yungs kar tshad tsam rin chen zur brgyad pa// rin chen 'bras bu raM las byas pa'i 'khor lo nyid// gang yin de gyur rnal 'byor shes mchog gis// rdo rje sogs mtshan de 
31b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs rnams kyi// de rnams nyid dang mtshan ma spro bar bya// mtshan ma brtan por byas pas brtags na ni// 'od zer du ba'i 'od dang de bzhin gzhan// me khyer 'od dang snang ba chen po ste// rim gyis mthar thug
31b8(rgyud 'grel): phra mo'i sbyor ba'o// rngub pa dang ni gnas dang ring du gyur// sdud dang gang ba dang ni 'dzin pa rnams// 'ong ba dang ni rjes dran sngon grub rnams// srog ma bsdams par gyur pa gang yin dge/ oM dang dbugs de mnyam du 
32a1(rgyud 'grel): nang du zhugs// a'i sngags dang thabs gcig dbus na gnas// hUM gi mthar ni rang gi sgra dang ldan// bzlas pa kan dang mchu sbyar spang bar bya// de nyid sa bon las 'dir sangs rgyas spro// 'od zer tshogs 
32a2(rgyud 'grel): de nam mkhar song nas kyang // de nas byung ba'i lha mo de rnams kyis// dam tshig zhes bya'i 'khor la mchod par byed// thams cad kun tu 'khyud par gyur pa dang // dga' ba'i dbang gis sangs rgyas rnams 'khyud 'gyur// de nas 
32a3(rgyud 'grel): da byas sbyi ga'i semapa / du 'a ba dang rnags pa sa/ pa mas dang thas rnas b+h+ya/ nga ga suM na di rnas pathams pas// deg ma'i chags sanas m+b+ha la smras// da 
32a4(rgyud 'grel): yis 'khor lo mchog sad byas// mgo bo pags pa'i mtho gang tsam du ni// ma lus yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba dgod// bdud rtsi lnga rnams oM dang ldan pa ni// zhu bas skad cig de la rang lus bab// bsam bya gangs chu 
32a5(rgyud 'grel): bsil 'dra bab gyur pas// ma lus skyo ba rnam par bsal bar bya// de nas thangs cig de yis ngal bsos nas// slar yang de yis gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya// gong du bshad pa'i dbang bskur mchod pa dang // bstod
32a6(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs smon lam mthar thug brjod// byas nas gang dag gang rigs rab 'byung ba'i// de ni de dang de yi snying gar gzhug/ de nyid gsum tshig gis ni byin brlabs bya// gnas nas thogs med ye shes gnyis med tshul// 
32a7(rgyud 'grel): de la gshegs gsol gleng gzhi de rnams ni// las rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin no// de las langs nas ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid chen por rang lha'i rnam pa gzung // snang ba tsam du yul de mthong nas ni// 
32a8(rgyud 'grel): sku tshogs rdo rje bdag nyid dngos rnams dag/ rang gi sa bon las byung yongs rdzogs pa'i// 'khor lo rang gi snying zlar zhugs par bsam// raM las byung ba'i me yang bsgom par bya// zan par gyur pa'i tshe na 'di skad gsungs/ 
32b1(rgyud 'grel): sngar bshad rlung dang me dang dgos dbus su// rdo rje la sogs cho ga bzhin byas nas// sku sogs lha rnams kun tu tshim par bya// nang gi bdag nyid kyi ni sbyin sreg las// mthar thug par yang sems kyi bya ba ste// phung po
32b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs bud shing kun tu ldan// ye shes me 'bar ba yi phung po ni// bsreg pa gang yin de ni bla med bshad// ma lus 'dod pa yi ni cho ga nyid// de yis rang gi lha yi rnam par bsgom par bya// rang dang gzhan lus la yang kun
32b3(rgyud 'grel): tu mchod// sangs rgyas rnams bsten dam tshig shin tu thob// rjes su mthun pa'i 'gro ba'i don byas shing // de bzhin gshegs rnams kun tu mchod par bsam// sems ni gcig tu mnyam par bzhag gyur pas// lus/ 
32b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i las rnams rtag tu bya// gang yang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las// dga' bas thams cad nyin mtshan rab byed pa// de yi sngags dang phyag rgya rab brtags par// sangs rgyas mchog rnams kyis ni rab tu 
32b5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// ji ltar dngos po gcig la rnam par rtog/ dpag med 'byung 'gyur bud med mthong ba las// kyi dang 'dod pa can dang rab byung gsum// bde dang sdug bsngal rnam par grol ba'i sems// lus la sogs pa'i 
32b6(rgyud 'grel): dge dang mi dge'i las// gang phyir de ni sems kyi dbang gis gsungs// de bas rtag tu rnam rtog dra gcod pa'i// sems ni nag po'i las su mi 'gyur ro// dam tshig nyams pas kham las byung ba yi// snying gar sna 
32b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje yis bkod pa// khaM las byung ba'i ral gri de nyid ste// sa bon 'di las byung ba'i don yod grub// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa yi// gong gi go rim nyid bzhin thams cad bya// myur du dbang 
32b8(rgyud 'grel): bskur bas ni nyes kun dang // 'gro ba rang bzhin gyis ni dag par lta// phyi rol khrus la'ang cho ga 'dis bya'o// gang zhig thun mtshams nyams par gyur pa yis// des kyang cho ga 'di ni bya ba ste// ji lta ba 
33a1(rgyud 'grel): / bzhin nyes pa gsum 'byung gsungs// gang yang sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbus gnas pa'i// hUM las byung ba yi ni bgegs mthar byed// bdud rtsi zhes bya 'khor lo dbang bskur bas// 'bad pas bgegs
33a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams thams cad gzhom bya ste// de ltar ting 'dzin gsum po bsgom bdag nyid// gang bsgoms pas ni shin tu skyo gyur nas// 'khor lo rang snying nang bzhugs rnam par bsam// rnal 'byor ldan pas rig mar ldan 
33a3(rgyud 'grel): par nyal// rnal 'byor gnyid log ldang ba'i dus su ni// lha mo'i tshogs kyis blangs pa'i glu yi sgras// myur ba'i kun tu langs nas yang byas te// sngar bshad pa yi mnyam par gzhag par bya// dngos grub mtshan ma nye 
33a4(rgyud 'grel): bar brtags nas ni// khang bzang ngos gnyis nas ni 'dzeg pa dang // dag pa'i gtsug lag khang dang sangs rgyas sku// rmi lam nu ma gzhan dang rgyal po mthong // de nyid gsum gyi cho ga bzhin mchod nas// dngos grub 
33a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa yis ni dkyil 'khor bya// rig pa 'dzin dang ri lu mig sman dang // bcud kyis len pa'am phyag rgya che la sogs// rta dang gser dang rin chen sa gzhi 'gro// khrag dang bu dang bu mo du ma byin// bskal pa grangs
33a6(rgyud 'grel): med gsum la sogs pa yis// 'di ru la las sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur// gang yang bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin// thams cad bsgoms pas bde bar nyer bsgoms nas// de steng sdig pa kun las rnam grol 
33a7(rgyud 'grel): nas// skad cig gis te rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// bdag gis man ngag brtsams 'di rab dad pas// bla ma'i zhal gyi pad+ma las rnyed de// mkhas pa rnams kyis 'di la brtag mo dgyes// 'gro ba kun la phan phyir bdag 
33a8(rgyud 'grel): gis byas// ji ltar log pa'i rdzun gyis byas pa yis// pa yi drung nas cung zad rnyed pa ltar// de bzhin bdag gis bsod nams cung zad rnyed// de nas 'jig rten 'jam pa'i rdo rjer shog/ dpal ldan u rgyan yul du bstan// 
33b1(rgyud 'grel): skyes shing // dpag med rgyud don ma lus rab mkhyen pa// dpal ldan rnam par dul zhi'i zhal snga nas// de yis dbang bskur slob ma'i gtso bo mchog/ de las sin+d+hu ngos su de skyes shing // rnam thos pasti gnas zhes 
33b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad rgyal bzhugs nas// shAkya'i bshes gnyen bdag nyid sangs rgyas shing // de yis yongs dkrol zhal gyi man ngag go// dpal ldan u rgyan yul nas byung ba yi// sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi zhal snga nas kyi sgrub 
33b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs man ngag go rdzogs so// // lo ts+tsha ba dge slong khrung leng rin chen bzang pos bsgyur zhing zhus te gdan la phab pa'o// // dpal gas pa 'das pa'i sbub pas can pabang ban kya blo ban can po sa ma rgyas yan kyi 
33b4(rgyud 'grel): mamapa rdzas/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ sa man+ta dra nA ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan mi 
33b5(rgyud 'grel): shes kun spangs dri med gzi brjid ldan// dpag med rigs kyi sprul pa rnams kyis rab brgyan cing // shes rab yan lag 'dus pas 'bar zhing rnam mdzes pa// 'jam dpal gang de mchod phyir de la phyag 'tshal
33b6(rgyud 'grel): lo// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i gzhung lugs bshes gnyen ni// dam pa yis ni bskul phyir spro byas te// 'gro ba ma lus don ni phun tshogs pa'i// rgyur gyur cho ga bdag gis bshad par bya// dal 'byor 'di ni shin tu/ 
33b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba dang // 'jig rten skye bo dam pa phrad rnyed dka'// de bas shes rab thabs la gzhol ba yi// yid la byed pa'i mchog de bsgrub par bya// de la sngags pa snying rje'i stobs kyis ni// byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed pa 
33b8(rgyud 'grel): dang // gtong ba la sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// zab mo'i tshul dag la ni lhag par mos// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga yis// rang gi dbang bskur phun sum tshogs ldan zhing // cho ga bzhin du rjes 
34a1(rgyud 'grel): gnang thob pa yi// blo dang ldan pas rang sngags mnyes par bya// la la dri med chu ni phun tshogs shing // shing mchog mdzes pas rnam par brgyan pa yi// ri bo'i phyogs gcig tu ni bcom ldan 'das/ 
34a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dbyangs zhes bya de ltar rab bsgrub bya// dang por nang bar snying ga'i bla dbus su// dri med 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba'i me// de nyid ces bya rnam bkod brtser ldan pas// sgo la sogs pa yang dag dag par bya// tsan dan 
34a3(rgyud 'grel): bzang po la sogs kyis byugs shing // dri zhim me tog btsal bkram mchog gi cha// bsam gtan gnas su bde ba'i stan la ni// gnas nas dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// dmigs te sna tshogs 
34a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i sprin rnams ni// dang por spro sogs blo ldan gyis bya zhing // dge ba rnams ni 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir// sdig pa dag ni bshags pa la sogs bya// gang zhig thog med srid pa'i chu klung du// ma lus kun rtog/ 
34a5(rgyud 'grel): gis bsags rnyog pa rnams// thugs rje che ldan spyan sngar de dag ni// cho ga bzhin du thams cad bshags par bgyi// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'phags pa gzhan gyis dge ba gang mdzad pa/ 
34a6(rgyud 'grel): de dag kun la yang dag yi rang zhing // byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo bar bgyi// yid kyi rol pa dri med zla 'bras bsgrubs// snying rje dam pa mtha' yas pa yi thabs// rang gi yid la gnas par gyur pa yi// bde gshegs rnams/ 
34a7(rgyud 'grel): la rtag tu skyabs su mchi// rtog pa ma lus pa las nges grol zhing // sems dpa' dam pa kun gyi phun tshogs gzhi// dngos po thams cad ro gcig ngo bo nyid// dam pa'i chos la rtag par skyabs su mchi// 'ching ba rnams 
34a8(rgyud 'grel): las yang dag grol gyur cing // snying rje mchog gis bskrun pa'i dpal dang ldan// rab tu dga' sogs sa la rab zhugs pa// brtul zhugs dbang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi// bsam dang rnam par smin pa dag 
34b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas// sgrib pa kun gyi bag chag yang dag 'byin// lhag par mos pas rnam par brgyan pa yi// sems ni byang chub dam pa bskyed par bgyi// bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyi lam gcig pu// sbyin sogs rnam 
34b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu dkar po'i yon tan tshul// rdzogs sangs rgyas dag ma lus ngo bo'i blos// yang dag nyid du da ni gnas par bgyi// snying rjes 'jig rten 'di ni ma lus pa// lta ba'i dra bas bcings la dmigs nas ni// yang dag 
34b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems ni mnyam med pa// sngags pas tshogs de ltar bsgom par bya// ngo bo nyid dang bral phyir stong pa ste// rang bzhin rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med// rtog pa rnams dang bral phyir dngos po ni// ma lus smon/ 
34b4(rgyud 'grel): ngas pa thas// k+sha ga / da sa sa / 1 su gas// yul 
34b5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs 'od dang ldan// gru gsum gyen du gnas pa'i nang gi ni// nam mkha' rang gi ngo bo rdo rje 'dzin// chos 'byung zhes bya phyag rgya'i dbus gnas pa// pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje mdzes pa der// bruM gyi 'khor lo las byung 
34b6(rgyud 'grel): rig bcas pa'i// rnam snang mdzad yan lag las yang dag byung // thub dbang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i// zer gyis phyogs tshogs ma lus kun tu khyab// mi mnyam bdag med phyir zur bzhi mnyam// 
34b7(rgyud 'grel): dran dang dbang po'i mchog gi sgo rnams yin// bsam gtan bzhi po dag gi rta babs dang // ting 'dzin kha khyer gyis ni kun tu bskor// kha khyer de la brten pa'i mchod pa ni// dam pa 'dzin pa gzungs kyi tshogs rnams 
34b8(rgyud 'grel): yin// sna tshogs rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam spras pa// gang phyir 'gro ba'i bsam kun rdzogs mdzad pa'i// rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan phreng ba dang // dril bu sgra sgrogs phyogs sgo kun khyab pa// gang phyir dam chos/ 
35a1(rgyud 'grel): gsung rab yan lag dgu// gdul bya thams cad la ni bskyod pa po// me long 'dra ba dra phyed me tog gi/ phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan mnyam pa med/ ye shes me long dri med byang chub kyi// yan 
35a2(rgyud 'grel): lag dri ni me tog phun sum tshogs// ka ba bzang po brgyad kyis nyer mdzes pa// rnam thar brgyad po rnam par dag pa yin// rdo rje'i thig dang yang dag ldan pa ni// rdo rje theg chos 'khor lo rab bskor ba'o// 
35a3(rgyud 'grel): bla med mtha' yas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// gzugs sogs yul rnams rnam par dag pa yin// mchod pa lnga yis rnam par brgyan pa ni// chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun yin// sna tshogs pad+ma'i 
35a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dab mar legs gnas pa'i// nyi zla mgon bcas lha yi gnas rnams dang // rin chen ma lus pa yis rnam spras pa// gzhal yas khang pa der ni bsam par bya// bcu drug cha dang tshogs las byung ba yi// 
35a5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag ni dbus nyid du// 'od zer dpag tu med pa'i tshogs ldan pa// dbus ma'i gdan la cho ga bzhin du bsam// dpal mchog dang po'i snying po las byung ba'i// rdo rje bzang 'dir nor bu
35a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar 'dra la// dpag med thub pa'i 'od tshogs rnam 'phro ga/ phyogs sgo mtha' yas khyad par rab bsgrub pa// dang po'i snying po mchog bcas bsgoms nas ni// nga rgyal de ltar mtha' yas sprul pa yis// 
35a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba mchog gi don rnams byas gyur cing // thub mchog phra rab las bsgrubs mtshungs med pa// zla ba rgyas 'drar dkar ba'i mdangs ldan zhing // kayas dang g.yon pa'i zhal ni sngo dang dmar/ 
35a8(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rgyan rnams 'bar ba'i phyag gnyis kyis// rig ma dam par 'khyud par mdzad pa'o// lhag ma'i phyag gis rdo rje ral gri dang // pad+ma rin chen bsnam pas zung gnyis mdzes// khams gsum
35b1(rgyud 'grel): khong ni rnam par brgyan pa yis// thub pa'i 'od tshogs du ma rnam par 'gyed// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rnam dag pas// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid snying rje mchog/ ma lus 'gro ba'i de nyid gcig pu 
35b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid// rgyal ba skyed byed nyid kyi sku ru bsam// mchog tu rjes chags phun tshogs dpag med kyis// 'dul ba'i 'jig rten thams cad dmigs nas ni// dga' ba'i sgyu ma'i sgra yis de rnams dang // rgyal ba'i 
35b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams ma lus gzhug par bya// de ni stan la sogs pa'i lha mo dang // gzugs sogs ma lus yul gyi rang bzhin du// byung nas rig mde dag thams cad ni// ring gi rig ma'i nang du chud par bya// 
35b4(rgyud 'grel): de yi pad+ma'i lte ba'i nang du ni// dkyil 'khor dri med zla zer las byung bar// bsams nas blo yis 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams ni// ma lus de ni rab tu gzhug par bya// gsang ba'i rdo rje dam pa'i dbus su ni// rnam 
35b5(rgyud 'grel): snang la sogs rgyal ba'i tshogs gzhug ste// zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs su gyur pa dang // des ni de rnams de 'og dbang bskur bya// sa yi snying po phyag na rdo rje dang // mkha' snying 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrib sel bcas// 
35b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan kun tu bzang po zhes bya bas// de dag mig la sogs pa grangs bzhin no// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dag dang // reg bya dang ni chos dbyings rdo rje dang // sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyi// ngo bo nyid gyur/ 
35b7(rgyud 'grel): spyan la sogs par grags// gzugs dang tshor ba de bzhin 'du shes dang // 'du byed dang ni rnam par shes bshad pa// rnam par snang mdzad la sogs bde gshegs te// de rjes sa bani gyis ni dbyung bar bya// 
35b8(rgyud 'grel): kI dzaM khaM gaM Sh+kaM saM zhes bshad pa// 'di dag mig la sogs pa rnams kyi mig/ rnga hUM baM ho khaM raM zhes bshad pa// de dag gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa// laM baM paM taM zhes bya bzhir bshad pa// de dag spyan la sogs pa 
36a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi yin// bruM AM d+hI khaM hUM zhes bya ba 'di// rim pa ji bzhin brtag pa la sogs pa'i 'o// oM adra hUM zhes bya ba'i sems nyid ni// 'od ldan ho dang spel ba cho ga bzhin// pad+ma'i nang du 
36a2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa mnyam med pa// shes rab chags pas zhu bar bsam// de yi 'od kyi mthu yi sa gnyis ka yang // zla ba zhu bar byas par mthong ba dang // stan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis ni// grwa yi sgra yis 
36a3(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar byas par bsam// sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs// dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la skyabs tu gsol// mgon po gal te de ring bdag gi gson par 
36a4(rgyud 'grel): mchi bzhed na// sems can yab chen mnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// rdo rje'i sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan// sangs rgyas don du byang chub don dam rab tu phan par 
36a5(rgyud 'grel): gzigs// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba// 
36a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dag gi don dang dgos pa mdzad la rab tu brtson// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// dga' ba'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// khyod ni
36a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam nyid thugs brtse ba// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchi bzhed na// yon tan rin chen mang 
36a8(rgyud 'grel): po'i gter gur bdag la dgyes par mdzod// de lta'i glu yi ngo ru byas pas na// chos kun sgyu ma lta bur yang dag rig/ snang ba'i 'od zer gyi ni dkyil 'khor can// rang gi sngags kyi lus su rang nyid gyur/ 
36b1(rgyud 'grel): de yi 'od zer ma lus pa rnams kyis// rang lha dang mtshungs sprul pa'i thub dbang pos// dpag tu med pa'i yid kyis bcug pa las// dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhes byar gyur// gur gum bzang po'i mdog 
36b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar dmar ba la// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal ni sngo dang dkar// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa yi// phyag gnyis shes rab dam pa 'khyud pa dang // mdangs ldan ral gri dang ni mda' nyid dang // ut+pal/ 
36b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon gzhu mtha' yas 'od ldan bsdams// ma lus rigs rnams 'grobs rnam brgyan cing // sgrub pa nam mkha' ma lus dkyil 'khor yin// dngos rnams thams cad gzung dang 'dzin pa dang // bral bas dngas 
36b4(rgyud 'grel): bo med pa nyid du shes// rnam par byang la mngon par zhen pa ni// med pas byin gyis brlabs pa 'di nyid bya// oM d+harmA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha// de 'og rang snying po sa bon 'od rnams kyis// rang gi mig sogs su 
36b5(rgyud 'grel): snying la sogs pas// ji bzhin bkang nas dri med rang zla yis// rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas yi ge hUM// thugs kyi rdo rje'i de bzhin la dang ni// mgon por pad+ma 'khor lo la gnas pa'i// a dang oM ni gsungs gi
36b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang // sku yi rdo rje nyid du bsam par bya// de yi thugs kha'i 'od kyi tshogs rnams dang // shes rab dam par gnas pa'i 'od rnams kyis// kun nas rgyal ba'i dbang po mchod nas ni// thugs kyi rdo rje la sogs
36b7(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab// dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlab nas su// rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas 
36b8(rgyud 'grel): rnams// rdo rje mi byed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlab nas su// rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+mak+ko he// chos kyi gsung la ma dpal dang ldan// 
37a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlab nas su// rdo rje gsung gis mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// 
37a2(rgyud 'grel): deng bdag byin gyis brlab nas su// rdo rje gsung gis mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// dpal ldan rdo rje sku 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis 
37a3(rgyud 'grel): brlab nas su// rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa// deng bdag byin gyis brlab nas su// rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol// oM sarba 
37a4(rgyud 'grel): tathA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko he/ nam mkha' lta bur ngo bor rdo rje gsum// mtshan nyid dag dang bral bar dmigs nas ni// phyogs bcur kun bzhugs pa yi thub pa'i tshogs// snying po'i 'od zer rnams kyis 
37a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bskul// thub pa'i mchog gi 'od zer las byung ba'i// rig pa'i tshogs rnams phyag na bum bsnams te// ye shes chu yis mngon par dbang bskur bas// rang gi rigs kyi gtsos brgyan cod pan gyur// 
37a6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin rang gi lha 'dra rang snying pos// sprul pa'i rig pa nyid ni yang dag lta// mig la sogs pa dgang zhing yi ge gsum// rnam par bkod pas lus ni 'od dang ldan// de nyid shes pas mgo dang snying ga dang / 
37a7(rgyud 'grel): lte ba gsang ba de bzhin brla gnyis sogs// oM hUM swA AHhA zhes grags pa rnams// de ni sku thugs rdo rje bzang rigs sogs// lnga po rnams kyis yan lag byin brlabs te// 'od kyi phreng ba dam pas 'gro 
37a8(rgyud 'grel): gsum khyab// a yis sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba bya// hUM gis 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par sprul// shes rab dam pa'i rgyu mthun ngo bo nyid// thabs dang bcas par 'gyur ba'i rang gi lus// de yi bde gshegs 
37b1(rgyud 'grel): rjes su mnyes bya zhes// sngags pas dga' ba kun tu brtsam par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ thugs ka'i zla ba'i sngags kyi 'od rnams kyis// ma lus sangs rgyas tshogs rnams 
37b2(rgyud 'grel): bcug nas ni// hUM gi rdo rje las byung dri ma med pa yi// yid tshul dam pa'i tshul skyes la gnas pa// rang gi snying po las byung ma lus pa'i// rang gi dkyil 'khor pa yi gzugs bsams la// cho ga 'di yis sems/ 
37b3(rgyud 'grel): ni brtan po dang // 'jig rten rnams la phan phyir yang dag dbyung // badz+ra d+h+r-ika ces bya dang thugs rdo rje// skye bo dam pa'i don mdzad yang dag bskul// nor bu sngon po'i 'od 'drar yang dag 'bar// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i 
37b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal ni dkar dang dmar// dam pa dang po lta bu'i phyag dang ldan// kha dog dpag tu med pa'i 'od tshogs mnga'// blo dang ldan pas legs bsdus bdag nyid kyi// dngos po thams cad kyis ni zhugs par bya// dzi na dzika/ 
37b5(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba sku rdo rje// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i sku mdog zhal gyis mongs// 'khor lo la sogs phyag mtshan rnams de bzhin// shar gyi pad+mar zla ba'i dbus su bsam// rat+na d+h+r-ika ces bya ba 'di yis ni// nor bu rin 
37b6(rgyud 'grel): chen 'byung zhal gzhon nu 'dra// bco ma'i gser gyi mdangs dang 'dra ba la// phyag drug ma rgad rin chen la sogs bsdams// A maM kaM 'od dpag med pad+ma ni// rAg ltar dam nganal gnyis de dang 'dra// 'ad 
37b7(rgyud 'grel): zer 'bar zhing phyag na pad+ma sogs// mtshan ma bsdams pa nub tu bsam par bya// pra dz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces bya dang don yod grub// rin chen margad lta bu'i mdog ldan zhing // snga ma lta bu'i zhal sogs phun sum tshogs 
37b8(rgyud 'grel): mnga' ba// ral gri la sogs bsnams pa byang du bsam// ral bcod pan mdzes dang sna tshogs pa'i// rin chen mchog gi 'od zer 'bar bas brgyan// rig pa mgon dang rab tu bcas pa'i sku// thams cad nyi 
38a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la bsam// mo ha ra ti zhes pas lha mo spyan// zla ba dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa la gnas pa// mchog tu sreg cing sku yi rdo rje 'dra// me yi phyogs nyid du ni bsam par bya// dwe Sha 
38a2(rgyud 'grel): ti zhes pa dga' ba che// dga' chen mchog 'dod mA ma kI zhes pa// zhal mdzes phyag rnams thugs kyi gtso 'dra ba// rnam par sgeg pa bden bral mtshams su bsam// rA gan+ti zhes bya yum mchog ni// gos dkar 
38a3(rgyud 'grel): yon tan rin chen mtha' yas pa// dri med sku ni gsung gi dbang phyug 'dra// rlung gi phyogs su rnam par bsam par bya// badz+ra ra tis rab bskul sgrol ma ni// dri med rin chen 'od kyi phreng ba yis// phyogs kyi tshogs 
38a4(rgyud 'grel): khebs rang gi ngo bo ni// rin chen dbang 'dra dbang ldan phyogs su bsam// lha mo 'di rnams nges pa'i phyag mtshan ni// 'khor lo bzang dang ut+pal dmar po dang // pad+ma ut+pal gser mdog rim bzhin bsam// lhag ma 
38a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni bdag po ji bzhin 'dod// de nyid gsum gyis gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// lha mo rnams ni sku la sogs 'dra bar// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams gyur bzhi po dang // rtsa ba'i sgo yi ngos gnyis dag tu bsam/ 
38a6(rgyud 'grel): ya mAn+ta kr-ita ces byas gshin rje gshed// bza' yas 'jigs 'od phyogs kun khyab dang ldan// dus mtha' mi bzad sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mdog/ thugs kyi rgyal po dag dang sku mtshungs pa// drag po'i rigs 'od dpag med// 
38a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'phro bas// gshin rje mthar mdzad shin tu gdug pa yi// sbrul gyis lus kyi yan lag rnam brgyan pa// dpal ldan shar gyi sgo na bsam par bya// pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita ces byas bla med 'od// drag cing phyag sogs sku yi rdo rje 
38a8(rgyud 'grel): 'dra// gzhan gyis mi thub ces bya gdum po ni// lho phyogs kyi ni sgo ru bsam par bya// pad+man+ta kr-ita ces byas phyogs rnams kyis// 'khor los 'od kyis mngon par khebs byed pa// 'od mdangs 'jig dus med 'drar 
38b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs par ldan// phyag la sogs par gsung gi rdo rje 'dra// gdug pa du ma rnam gnon 'jigs pa'i zhal// thub dbang ha ha zhes ni bzhad pa yis// ri bor bcas pa skyel bas skrag mdzad pa// rta mgrin de bzhin nub kyi
38b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su bsam// big+h+nAM ta kr-ita ces byas dpa' bo ni// dus mtha'i me ltar drag po bdud rtsi 'khyil// 'phags pa'i zhabs sogs mi bskyod dang mtshungs pa// de bzhin byang gi sgo ru bsam par bya// rnam par snang 
38b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad thugs gtso 'od dpag med// thugs kyi dbang po rim bzhin cod pan yin// thob dbyug pa de bzhin pad+ma dang // rdo rje sogs 'di phyag ni kun la bsam// de ltar yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// 
38b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos po thams cad kyis ni bltas nas kyang // snying po'i sngags kyi 'od zer lcags kyu yis// drangs nas bde bar gshegs rnams bsgom par bya// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin dri med pa'i// ting 'dzin las byung // 
38b5(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i bdes gang bar// 'khor lo bsams nas de nas gshin rje ni// mthar byed la sogs bshad pas bsrung bar bya// rang gi snying pos mngon bzlas mchod yon ni// tsan dan bzang sogs me tog gis mdzes 
38b6(rgyud 'grel): dbul// rang las byas pa lta bur dbang bskur zhing // cho ga yis ni mngon par mchod par bya// pad nang rang gi sa bon 'di rnams kyis// gzugs la sogs pa thams cad drangs nas ni// yang dag byang chub yid 
38b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi ngo bo yi// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom par bya// shes rab baspu re las byung ba yi// 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs rgya chen tshogs// ma lus nam mkha'i gtos ni kun du khyab// de la blo dang ldan pas rab tu s+ho// 
38b8(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi sgo las nges par byung ba yi// yan lag dri med rgyan kun gyis legs brgyan// me long pi wang dri dang ro yi snod// gos dang chos 'byung ba la sogs pa yi// mtshan mas rim gyis rnam par sgeg bcas shing / 
39a1(rgyud 'grel): rol pa'i lag pa dam pa rnams dang ni// 'od kyi snang bas sprul pa sna tshogs pa'i// mchod pa'i sprin gyi thabs khyab pa dang // dngos rnams sgyu ma la sogs so sor ni// yang dag rig cing 'jig 
39a2(rgyud 'grel): rten ma mkhas pa// rtog pa ma lus kun las nges grol zhing // mchog tu bde ba bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa// gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams dang ni// de bzhin gyi yi dri sogs thams cad kyis/ 
39a3(rgyud 'grel): brtag der rjes la// yang yid lhag pa'i lha ru gnas pa la// chos rnams bstod pa'i sgra ni byed par bsam// mi bskyed do rje/ shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'a 
39a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum// rdo rjed dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che// da dzin bdaga' chen po// rang bzhin 'dags la mtshag gi mchog/ san pa de rje phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen rgyal bar rab tu zag// 
39a5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' dri med mkha'// rang bzhin dag pagos pa med// rdo rje'i skul phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje mi 'chi rgyal po che// mi tog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pa rol phyin pa brnyes// rdo rje'i gsung la phyag 
39a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo// 'bar ba'i rlung gis byin brlabs rlung dang me'i// 
39a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la gnas rab spar bdud ci wa// de nas yi ge gsum bzlas dpag med pa'i// thub pa'i dbang po'i nang du chud par bya/ ye shes bdud rtsi'i ngo bor bsams nas ni// su~M dgod rdo rje'i lce ni bzang po dang // 
39b1(rgyud 'grel): snying ga'i zla ba'i dbus sum lus pa'i// rgyal ba'i 'khol lo des ni tshim par bya// snying po'i 'od zer dpag med kyis sprul pa'i// thub pas mi shes kun tu nges gsal nas// 'gro ba ma lus rdzogs 
39b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas byas te// rang gi gsangasags nang du chud par bya// gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang bral bas// 'dzin pa de ni mngon sum mthong mi nus// gzung ba rnams kyang cung zad yad min pa/ 
39b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan pa'i 'brel pa yis kyang mthong ba med// bde sogs de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ni// bya ba 'ga' yang yod par ma mthong ste// cig car shes pa'i phyir na gzugs sogs bzhin// 'di dag lan 
39b4(rgyud 'grel): pa por ni yo ma yin// dkar po la sogs gang zhig mthong ba rnams// de nyid dus gzhan dag tu mthong mi 'thung // 'di nyid rtag drug cig la gcig 'gal ba// yin gyir bde ba la sogs dag dang 
39b5(rgyud 'grel): gas pa la sags kyi ga' stan// gzugs lags pa 'das pa// dang gzugs su min pa 'du da la/ 
39b6(rgyud 'grel): rang rgya gzugs sogs brtags pa'i ngo ba nyid// klu dang mi rgyad ngas po ma lus pa// dri ba'i grong byer dag dang mtshungs pa yin// bdag dang bdag gi nam rtog rgyun byin// nga bdag gis der ni 'khor ba ste/ 
39b7(rgyud 'grel): dag pa byin gyi log de med pa yi// nga ba tsam gyis rnam par shes par bya// 'dir ni ni dang srid pa'i bdag/ chas nyid kyis ni dbye ba 'ga' yang med// gang phyir gzung ba la sogs rnam pa dang // bral ba 
40a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du ni rtag tu grub// de ni snang ba'i rang bzhin kun rtog las// thams cad ci yang yod pa ma yin te// sems las gzhan pa dag ces bya ba ni// yod pa ma yin de phyir de bdag 
40a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid// gang zhig gzugs la so sor zhugs gyur pa// de'i bdag nyid gang yin de nyid gzugs// de bas thams cad khyab par med par brtag/ snang bar gyur pa'i yul rnams gang yin pa// gang zhig 
40a3(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa'i gnas sa byung ba rnams/ de de gnyis su stong ba dang thal bas// des na rnam par dbye ba thams cad min// dad dang brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa dang // de bzhin dun dang bsam gtan namad/ 
40a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'ang // sgo bzang srung bar byed pa'i ngo bo nyid// shes rab rnam dag ma lus yul du snang // mtshan ma med pa'i dga' ba rnam dag pa// ma lus lha mo'i tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid// sems can don dang 
40a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang rnam rtog dang // 'jug pa'i rnam shes rnam par dag pa yang // me long sogs yid dri med ngo bo bas// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang rang bzhin te// de bzhin nyid ni rnam dag sbyor ba yis// 
40a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i gtso bo 'di ni rnam par bzhugs// gzugs la sogs pa'i 'khrul pa rnam bral bas// dri med phung po la sogs ngo bor grub// ser sna la sogs ldog par gyur pa ni// pha rol phyin pa dkar 
40a7(rgyud 'grel): po'i chos rang bzhin// rnam rtog med par bdag gzhan don 'byung ba'i// rgyu nyid kyis na de yang go rims bzhin// zab pa dang ni rgya che ba yis na// shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid can sems yin// 
40a8(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i don du ci yang gzhan dag las// dbye med dbye ba med min mi 'dod ste// gzhan du 'dzin pa las ni bzlog phyir dang // de bzhin bye brag la sogs rtog bral yin// de ltar brtags nas rang snying dri 
40b1(rgyud 'grel): med pa// zla ba la gnas mtshan mar bsgom par bya// gsang sngags dam pa thig le'i gzugs su ni// rang yid 'od dang ldan par yongs su bsgom// sems de'i 'od zer dri med pas sad pa'i// sku
40b2(rgyud 'grel): gsung rdo rje'i lus ni mchog gyur pa'i// slar yang 'di nyid du ni nges bzhugs shing // ye shes bdud rtsi 'bab par bsam par bya// nang gi lus dang de bzhin thams cad kyang // de yis kun tu mthar ni 
40b3(rgyud 'grel): snang byas nas// ba spu re re'i khongs las byung ba yi// tshogs kyis sna tshogs kun tu dgang bar bya// yang na rang gi mtshan ma phra mo ni// 'od ldan sna rtser gnas par thub pa yi// 'khor lo nang du 
40b4(rgyud 'grel): chud byas snying rje yis// nang gi shes rab dam pa nyin mtshan bsgom// mtshan ma brtan po mthong na spro ba ni// 'od zer de yis sprul pa'i thub dbang dang // rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi phyag mtshan rnams// 
40b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas yang dang yang du'o// yangan brnas la ci gcig sems cad ni// dngas kun bdag nyid rang gi sems dbang ga/ rang gi sngags na snga tshugs 'du ldan par// byas pas tho dang ldan 
40b6(rgyud 'grel): pas bsgom par bya// srog dang rtsol ba shin tu ma bsdams par// gsang sngags rgyal po gsal bar brjod bya zhing // sku sogs rim pa bzhin du yang na ni// cig car spro ba dag ni legs par bya// 
40b7(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' gtos dang mnyam pa sku sogs pa'o// 'od kyi sku yi snang bas yang yang dag dag // de nas sngam bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i// mdzad pa'i sprin gyis bkod pa kun d+ha s+t+wa~M// yongs su sras pa 
40b8(rgyud 'grel): rigs pa mchog rnams ni// bde chen babs pas gzhan gyis dbang thob nas// rnam par sgeg pa'i thub dbang tshogs rnams ni// mthar ni rang gi lus la gzhug par bya// rang gi snying po'i de nyid nges rtog 
41a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// skyobs sems kyi spyod pa zhum gyur na// rig pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag glur blangs pas// rab tu bskul nas yongs su mchod par bya// sems bzang po yi chu rgyun srog 
41a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// stsol ba'i 'od kyi lcags kyus drangs nas ni// cho ga ji bzhin su rdo rje sogs la// nges par dbang bas skyob bsal bar bya// de ltar thangs cig ngal gso byas nas ni// sngar bshad chag 
41a3(rgyud 'grel): yis ni de nyid shes// gsang sngags dam pa rgyun tu bzlas pa ni// sngags pa'ang kun tu chags pa med par bya// bstod dang mchod sogs gshegs su gsol pa dang // sngags pas rab tu 'badang 
41a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams rgya ning // me la mags par 'am ma bsdus nas ni// skal sogs pa btag pa dag tA tha// de sa de nyid mthong bas nam grol ba// sems can khams rnams kun tadamigs nas ni// snying rjes 
41a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba rnams la phan don du// smon lam rnams ni mngon sum nyid du bya// langs nas dag pa'i sems dpa' rang gi lha'i// rnam pa'i nga rgyal yid la byas nas ni// kun tu snang bar gnas pa'i yul rnams ni// 
41a6(rgyud 'grel): snga ma bzhin du yul du yongs su bsgom// rang rang gi ni ngo bo rnam dag pa// rim bzhin sku la sogs pa'i rdo rjer gyur// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur ni// chos nyid kyis na phan tshun khyad par med// 
41a7(rgyud 'grel): phyin ci log gi rtog pa spangs pa yis// bya ba ma lus pa ni rdzogs par bya// de yi thub pa'i 'khor lo ma lus pa// mchod pa 'di ni kun tu mchog yin no// bza' ba'i tshe na snying ga'i zla ba la// 'khor/ 
41a8(rgyud 'grel): lo'i gtso bo rang gi gsang sngags kyis// kun tu dmigs te byang chub sems kyi ni// ngo bo nyid gyur 'od dang ldan par bsam// rang gi zas la de nyid gsum bzlas te// thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis 
41b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag pa// de yis sku yi rdo rje la sogs pa// lha rnams kun tu tshim pa nyid du bya// phyi yi sbyin sreg cho gas bsgre bya zhing // yid kyi'ang yid nyid kyis ni bya ba ste// phung po'i bud shing rnam
41b2(rgyud 'grel): par bsreg pa yi// ye shes 'bar ba bla na med par bshad// de ltar ma lus pa yi 'dod pa yis// bdag nyid dam ni gzhan dag rang rang gi/ lha yi gzugs gyur pa la yang dag mchod// dam tshig/ 
41b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni bde gshegs rnams kyis gnang // rjes su mthun pa'i 'gro ba'i don rnams ni// ma lus bde gshegs mchod par yang dag brtag/ lus la sogs pa'i las rnams de dang de// rtag tu 
41b4(rgyud 'grel): legs pa mnyam ba banagasaH// rnam pa 'a gyu mams ldan lus dang // / ngag yad mas da sa yang dru bdag/ rnasngags kyim pa // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ldan sa 
41b5(rgyud 'grel): de gsungs so// gang phyir dngos po gcig la'ang sna tshogs pa'i// kun tu rtog pas bsags pa'i rnam pa las// sdug bsngal ba de dang grol ba skyed byed pa'i// las kyi khyad par mang po 'byung bar 
41b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de bas lus sogs dge dang mi dge ba'i// rnam pa'i las rnams sems kyi dbang las gsungs// de ltar rnyog pa ma lus spangs pa yi// sems ni nag po'i las su ga la 'gyur// dam tshig 
41b7(rgyud 'grel): nyams la snying ga'i zla bar ni// snying pos sna tshogs rdo rje ci bzhin bsam// dpal ldan dam tshig rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas// 'gro ba rang bzhin gyis dag rnams bsams la// sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab 
41b8(rgyud 'grel): ma dbus su ni// sngar gyi rim pas dbang bskur kun tu blang // phyi rol gyi yang khrus kyi cho ga la// rim 'di khyad par du yang bsam par bya// thun mtshams su yang de bzhin mchod la sogs/ 
42a1(rgyud 'grel): sngon du 'gro ba'i bzlas brjod byas nas ni// snying ga'i nang du 'khor lo chud byas la// snying rje dang ni shes rab ldan par nyal// ldang ba'i dus su dam tshig lha mo yi// yang dag ga 
42a2(rgyud 'grel): yis dpal ldan bskul bas ni// langs na thub pas bzlas brjod la sogs pa// cho ga snga ma bzhin du bya ba yin// dngos grub thob pa'i mtshan ma mthong nas ni// de nyid gsum mchod byas nas rang
42a3(rgyud 'grel): gi sems// sngar bshad dkyil 'khor dag la gnas nas ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu bsgrub par bya// bgegs rnams bdud rtsi thab sbyor 'khor lo yis// dbang bskur byas nas 'bad pa med par
42a4(rgyud 'grel): 'joms// gang zhig dbus su gnas par gyur pa yi// 'khor lo de yang de yi yin par 'gyur// tha mal rnam rtog rgyun las gzhan pa yi// srid pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan ci'ang yod ma yin// de
42a5(rgyud 'grel): dang rnam par 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i sems// 'di ni mngon sum du ni rtogs par 'gyur// zab cing rgya che ba yi bdag nyid can// gang yin der ni kun rtog snang mi 'gyur// rig pa las ni gzhan du 
42a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa dag/ yod pa min par sngar ni bsgrubs pas na// gang zhig gang dang mi mthun pa dag tu// lan cig gyur pa'ang de bgrod rgyas gyur pa// mthong ba'i bslabs pa rnam par 'phel ba yis// rang gi/ 
42a7(rgyud 'grel): mi mthun shin tu 'gag par byed// sbyin pa la sogs bdag med ldan pas kyang // za mal pa yi rang gi ngo bo las// rnam par ldog par mi 'gyur gang phyir 'dir// yod kyang de ni mi mthun 'gyur ma 
42a8(rgyud 'grel): yin// de ltar rtogs na snying rjer ldan pa dag/ ye shes pas ma yas skad cig gis sgrub pa// dpal ldan kun tu babang po'i rang gi ni// ngo bo su zhig nges par bsgom mi byed// dri med blo yi 'od zer 
42b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis ni// mun pa thams cad rnam par sel byed pa// rnam par bstan pas mdzad pa 'dis mchog gi/ bdag 'dra'i go skabs dag ni ga la yod// bla ma dam pa'i gzhung ni cung zad tsam// 
42b2(rgyud 'grel): bzung ba gang yin de yang dang por ni// 'ching ba lhod ces bya bar grags pas na// des na 'di la shin tu 'bad pa yin// de ltar rnam par sbyar las legs byung ba'i// dge ba dri med gang des 'gro ba'i
42b3(rgyud 'grel): yid// sangs rgyas ye shes mgon dang bcas pa der// gzhol bar gyur pas rtag tu sgom par shog/ dpal gsang ba 'dras pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba// byang chub
42b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru'i rdul le reg pa// slob dpon chen pa sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs sa// rgya gar mkhan pa An n+ya thad+d+haka 
42b5(rgyud 'grel): warma dang / zhu chen lo tsa ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// / 6// yan pa pa 'i gru mas ma chod ce 'i mags sa/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ tsa du raM ga sA d+ha nAM no pi ka sa man+ta b+ha/ 
42b6(rgyud 'grel): dra na ma/ bod skad du/ yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thibs kun tu bzang mo zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan 'khrul pa kun bsal dri ma med pa yi// gzi brjid 
42b7(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas rigs kyi sprul pas rnam brgyan pa// shes rab ma yis lus 'khyud mdzes pas klubs pa gang // 'jam dpal de la de mchod don dngos cho ga 'di bshad bya// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i
42b8(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis dam pa'i bshes gnyen gsol btab byed brod pas// 'gro ba'i don kun phun sum tshogs gzhi dngos po cho ga bshad par bya// skabs ldan g.yo ba 'di dang dam pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs 
43a1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu thob dka' 'jig rten la// dpyir thabs dang shes rab mthar byed byed 'dod sems ni mchog tu gyur pa yin// de nas snying rjer mthu las byung ba'i byang chub yid ldan gsang sngags/ 
43a2(rgyud 'grel): pa// gtong ba la sogs yon tan brgyad pa zab mo'i tshul la mos pa'am// dpal ldan gsang 'dus dkyil 'khor tshogs shin tu dbang bskur phun sum ldan/ cho ga bzhin du lung su la thob pa bzhi 
43a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags bsnyen pa blo ldan pas// gang zhig dri med chu sogs ljon shing mchog gis phreng ba klubs pa yi// gom pa'i ril bcom ldan 'jam dbyangs zhes bya rab tu bsgrub par bya// dang po tho rangs 
43a4(rgyud 'grel): snying ga'i dbus su dri med 'od 'phro de nyid bsam// bkod nas snying rje can gyis sgo la sogs pa yang dag par yang bya// dam pa'i tsan dan sogs bkrus dri zhim me tog bkram pa'i mchog cha la// bsam gtan 
43a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas su bde ba'i gnas su 'dug nas dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams// dmigs te sna tshogs mchod sprin spro sogs sngon du byas nas blo ldan pas// sdig pa la sogs 'di ltar bya'o dge ba 'phel don 
43a6(rgyud 'grel): du// thog ma med ldan srid pa'i rgyun la rtog pas bsags pa'i sdig kun gang // snying rje chen po'i mdun rim bzhin te thams cad bshags par bgyi// yang dag sangs rgyas byang chub 'phags dang gzhan 
43a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams mdzad pa'i dge ba gang // ma lus bdag gis yi rang yang dag de ni byang chub phyir bsngo'o// sems rgyas zla ba dri ma med las grub pas mtha' yas snying rje gnas// bdag gi yid la gnas pa'i 
43a8(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs la rtag tu skyabs su mchi// rtog pa kun las nges grol ma lus dam pa sems dpa'i bkra shis gzhi// dngos po kun gyi ngo bor chos la bdag nyid skyabs su mchi// bcings pas yang 
43b1(rgyud 'grel): dag spangs pa'i snying rje mchog gis drangs pa'i dpal ldan pa// rab dga' la sogasas la gnas pa dam bcas tshogs la skyabs su mchi// bsam pa rnam smin dag pas sgrib kun bag chags ma lus 
43b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom pa ste// mos pas rnam par brgyan pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// bde gshegs sras bcas lam gcig sbyin sogs bcu po dkar po yon tan ngo bo la// rdzogs 
43b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dag kun gyi rang bzhin blo yis de ltar bsten par bgyi// 'jig rten 'di dag lta ba'i dra bas bkab la snying rje dmigs nas su// yang dag byang chub sems kyi gzhal med bsgom rim 'ang 
43b4(rgyud 'grel): ni bsngags pas bya// stong pa rang bzhin med phyir rgyu 'bras phyir ni rang bzhin mtshan ma med// rjes su dpag pa gsal bas ma lus gzhi yo smon pa des bral lo// oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ka 
43b5(rgyud 'grel): de 'og ston zla dkar po mtha' med phyogs 'khor gnas pa sna tshogs 'od// 'phags par gnas pa'i gru gsum nang gi mkha' yi rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin// chos kyi 'byung zhes phyag rgya dbus su gnas 
43b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rjes brgyan// hUM gis rdo rje rgyan pa'i sa la kun tu bzang po las byung bsgom// bruM yig 'khor lo las byung rig ma dang bcas snang mdzad skur gyur pa// gsal ba thub dbang dkyil 
43b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sna tshogs 'od zer gyis khyab phyogs 'khor kun// gru bzhis mnyam pa'i phyir na mchog bzhi sa dran pa dbang po sgo rnams kyis// bsam gtan bzhi'i tA ra Na ting 'dzin mu khyud bzhi yis yongs 
43b8(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba// mu khrud de la gnas padam pa'i mchod pas 'brel ba'i gzugs rnams rgyan// sna tshogs rgyan rnams bkod pa 'gro ba'i bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs phyir// 'dul bas bskyod pa gsung / 
44a1(rgyud 'grel): rab yan lag dgu yi dam chos kun 'gro ci yi phyir// rlung gis bskyod pa rgyal mtshan phreng dang dril sbas grags pas phyogs su kun// me long ye shes rtag tu dri med byang chub yan lag ma 
44a2(rgyud 'grel): tog spos bkram zhing // dra ba dra byed me long me tog phreng ba sna tshogs brgyan pa'i gzugs// rnam par thar brgyad rnam par dag pas ka ba brgyad kyis klubs pa'i mchog/ rdo rje tshul gyis chos kyi 'khor 
44a3(rgyud 'grel): los sbyar phyir rdo rje'i thig ldan la// gzugs la sogs pa'i spyod yul dag pas bla med mtha' yas 'ad pa'i yon tan lnga// zas lngas brgyan pas rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings rgyu mthun/ 
44a4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas nyi ma zla bar bcas pa lha yi gdan// ma lus rin chen bkod pa'i gzhal yas brtsegs pa de la bsgom// bcu drug cha shas sde pa las byung zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ba yi dbus// 
44a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi gdan la cho ga bzhin du 'od dpag med bzhi bsam par bya// mchog gi dang po'i snying po las byung rdo rje dam pa ye shes gzugs// grangs med thug po'i 'od zer phreng bas grub pa'i phyogs sgo 
44a6(rgyud 'grel): kun// bsams nas dang po snying por bcas pa'i nga rgyal ldan pas sprul pa mtha' yas kyis// 'gro ba'i don mchog rab mdzad pa yi thugs mchog rdul phran rnam bkod gzugs brnyan can// g.yas
44a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon zhal ni gnag dang dmar ba zla ba rdzogs ltar dkar ba'i mdog/ gsal bas rnam par bkod pas brgyan pa'i phyag gnyis dam pa'i rig ma 'khyud// lhag ma'i phyag zung gnyis brgyan rdo rje ral gri 
44a8(rgyud 'grel): rin chen pad+ma 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum khong brgyan pa'i 'od zer rnam pa bde 'gro thub pa'i dbang // rnam thar gsum dag shes rab bdag nyid snying rje'i mchog gi thabs ldan pas// 'gro kun de nyid 
44b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig brgyal ba skyed byed sku bzhi mngon sum bya// mchog tu rjes chags phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten thams cad 'dul dmigs nas// dga' ba'i rdzu 'phrul sgra yis rgyal ba'i tshogs 
44b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams rang gi lus nang gzhug/ de ni spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo gzugs sogs yul gyi rang bzhin pas// phyung nas rig ma thams cad gzhi yi rig ma'i nang du thim par bya// de yi pad+ma'i snying 
44b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i dbus su dkyil 'khor dri med zla 'od las byung ba// blo yis bsams nas rdzogs par bde la skye bo'i tshogs rnams gzhug par bya// dam pa gsang ba'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnam snang mdzad sogs 
44b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i rgyan zhugs nas// zla ba zhu ba'i ngo bor gyur pas dbang bskur byas te de 'og tu// sa snying phyag na rdo rje na ma snying 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrib pa sel// dpal ldan kun tu bzang po de dag mig la sogs// 
44b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i grangs su gyur// gzugs sgra dri dang ro dang reg bya chos dbyings rdo rje yang // sa chu me rlung rang bzhin gyur pa spyan la sogs pa'i grangs su 'gyur ro// gzugs dang myong ba mtshan ma de bzhin kho na 'du byed 
44b6(rgyud 'grel): yid brjod pas// rnam snang mdzad sogs bde gshegs rnams te de 'og sa bon gyis dbyung bya// kI dza khaM gaM ska sa dang brjod pa de dag mig la sogs rnams so// myong ba mtshan ma de bzhin kho na 'du byed yid 
44b7(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa// rnam snang mdzad sogs bde gshegs dza hUM baM ho khaM raM brjod pas gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs so// la maM paM taM zhes kyang gsungs pa de bzhin spyan la sogs pa'o// bruM a dz+ri hUM zhes pas rtag la 
44b8(rgyud 'grel): sogs so// oM aHhUM zhes sems 'bar ho'i bar du zhugs pa cho ga bzhin// pad+ma'i nang gnas mnyam med shes rab chags pas zhu ba byed mthong ste// de yi 'od kyi mthu yis kyang ni zla bar zhu bar 
45a1(rgyud 'grel): byed mthong ste// 'di ltar spyan la sogs pa'i lha mos dbyangs kyi sgra yis bskul bar bsam// sems can khams na gnas pa'i dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs// dga' ba'i yid 'ong 
45a2(rgyud 'grel): don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab du gsol// mgon pa gal te ring bdag ni gsan par mchis bzhed na// sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// rdo rje 
45a3(rgyud 'grel): sku khyod bka' yis 'khor lo sems can kun la phan// sangs rgyas don du byang chub mchog sgrub rab tu phan par gzigs// mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhad na// 'dod 
45a4(rgyud 'grel): chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// khyed ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan pa'i thugs brdze ba// 'jig rten dag gi dgongs pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson// mgon pa 
45a5(rgyud 'grel): gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na// spyod pa dri med kun tu bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod// khyod ni rdo rje'i 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che// yang dag rdzogs sangs 
45a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa// mgon po gal te bdag te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na// yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyung bdag la dgyes par mdzod// de ltar dbyangs kyis 
45a7(rgyud 'grel): bskul bas sgyu 'phrul dra bar dngos kun legs bsams nas// 'od zer 'bar bas bskor ba'i gzhi yi sngags kyis lus su rang bsgyur bya// de la 'od kyis ma lus lha rnams rgyal ba'i thub dbang rnams// 
45a8(rgyud 'grel): nang du thim nas 'od kyis dpal 'jam pa'i rda rjeng snar bar bya// grang dgum mchog 'dad mar 'drag yas g.yon nal ni gnag dang dkar ba'i mdog/ sna tshags rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i phyag gnyis dam pa 
45b1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab 'khyud// gsal ba'i ral gri mda' dang ut+pal mthing ga gzhu ni mtha' yas 'od/ ma lus rigs rnams 'phro bas brgyan pa'i mkha' kun dkyil 'khor ldan skyob pa// gzung 'dzin bral bas dngos
45b2(rgyud 'grel): po thams cad ngo bo nyid med shes nas su// rnam par byang ba mngon bzhugs zab don byin brlabs 'di ltar bya// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// de 'og gzhi yi sa bon 'od kyis ji ltar rang la gang ste mig 
45b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs rnams// sa snying la sogs dri med rang snying zla ba'i rdo rje bum pa'i dkyil gnas pa// hUM gi thugs kyi rdo rje kha dang mgo la pad+ma 'khor lo'i dkyil du yang // a dang phyag 'tshal gnyis kyis gsung gi 
45b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sku yi rdo rje'ang bsam par bya// de thugs 'od zer rgyun gyis rang gi shes rab dang sbyor snang bas kun tu ni// rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams la mchod nas thugs kyi rdo rje la sogs byin gyis brlab// dpal ldan/ 
45b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas// thugs kyi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum 
45b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pas// de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas// thugs kyi rdo rje mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa ba at+ma ko haM// dpal ldan chos kyi gsung gi lam// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms 
45b7(rgyud 'grel): pas// de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas// gsung gi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// de ring bdag la byin brlabs 
45b8(rgyud 'grel): nas// gsung gi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ dpal ldan sku yi rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// de ring bdag la byin brlabs pas/ 
46a1(rgyud 'grel): sku yi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje me phyed gsum bsgoms nas// de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas// sku yi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// 
46a2(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rdo rje gsum ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin mtshan ma spangs pa mtshon byas te// sems kyi 'od zer rnams kyis bskul nas thams cad tshogs su gyur pa'i 
46a3(rgyud 'grel): thub pa'i sde// thub mchog 'od zer las byung rig ma tshogs kyi yang dag 'dzin pa yi// bum pa'i ye shes chu yis blugs pas rang rig gtso bo snang bas dbu brgyan gyur// de bzhin rang gi lha mo 'dra bar rang gi 
46a4(rgyud 'grel): snying po'ang bsgoms nas rig mar sprul// mig la sogs pa gang nas yig 'bru gsum bkod 'bar ba'i lus ldan ma// 'og snying lte ba gsang ba de bzhin brla gnyis sogs la de nyid shes par bya// oM hUM s+t+wa 
46a5(rgyud 'grel): AHhA zhes bya bas lus yid rdo rje dam pa'i rigs tshogs kyis// de lnga'i byin brlabs lus ni 'gro gsum khyab pas dam pa'i 'od tshogs bsam// as bskyed rnam par bkod pa'i snying po hUM las sprul pa'i 
46a6(rgyud 'grel): bad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// pad+ma'i shes rab tu mthun rang bzhin thabs dang bcas par gyur pa yi gzhi'i lus bsngags pa// de dang lhan cig bde gshegs rnams la rjes su chags par bgyi zhes brtsams/ 
46a7(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga na badz+ra swa b+ha At+ma ko haM/ sems kyi zla ba'i 'od kyis ma lus sangs rgyas tshogs ni bzhugs gnas te// hUM gi rdo rjer byung nas dri med pad+ma la gnas dam pa'i yid kyi gzugs/ 
46a8(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas rang ga sang bas bsad pa thams cad gan sa dkyil 'kha lha gzugs sa// tshig 'di yi sems ni bzhan pa dang zhes panas dg-i rA 'i zhes bya yum mchogs// mchog gi rjes su dka ma 
46b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes par mtha' yas yon tan rin chen ma// rin chen dbang phyag dra ba'i dngos po sgrol ba badz+rar ti zhes bskul bas// dri med rin chen phreng bas bsgoms pa'i phyogs 'khor byed ma dpang ldan 
46b2(rgyud 'grel): la// dam pa'i 'khor lo ut+pal dmar po pad+ma ut+pal se ri bo rnams kyis mtshan// de dag gi ni rim pa'i nges pa'i lhag ma'i ji ltar 'dod pa'i phyag bsnams yin// dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi 
46b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ni shar gyi sgo gnyis la ni bsam bya ba// gzugs sogs rdo rje lha mo sku la sogs dang gsum gyis so// shar gyi sgo ru grags pa bsam pa thams cad 'grub mtha' yas pas 'jigs pa'i 
46b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od// 'bar la ya man+ta kr-ita ces pas zad dus drag sprin dkyil 'khor dngos po ste// thugs bdag rgyal po mnyam pa'i sku ni du ma'i khro bo rigs kyi 'od byung ba// gshin rje mthar byed ces bya
46b5(rgyud 'grel): mi zad pa'i sbrul gyis su brgyan dpal ldan pa'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor gnas pa pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita ces pas bla na med ldan pa// sku yi dbang phyug bzhin du phyag la sogs pa drag po gzhan gyis mi thub gsal/ 
46b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas rta mgrin nub kyi phyogs kyi sgo ru 'od zer 'khrigs pas phyogs bskor ba// pad+hAn+ta kr-ita ces pas 'bar ba'i 'jigs pa'i me ltar 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gsung gi bzhin du phyag la sogs pa du 
46b7(rgyud 'grel): mas sdang ba 'jigs byed zhal// gang sgrogs bzhad pas ri rnams g.yo bar byed dang thub pa'i dbang rnams so// de nas mi bskyod 'dra ba'i zhal sogs bi grAn+ta kr-ita ces bya byang sgo ru// zad dus byin
46b8(rgyud 'grel): lta bu 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dpa' ba'o// rnam snang mdzad dang thub dbang snang ba mtha' yas thugs kyi dbang phyug dbu rgyan dang // rim par thob ba tsan pad+ma rdo rje la sogs phyag kyang de bzhin no// 
47a1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar rdzogs par bskyed par dkyil 'khor mthong nas dngos po thams cad kyis// snying po sngags kyi 'od zer lcags kyus bde gshegs spyan drangs bsgom par bya// thabs dang shes rab
47a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos po dri med ting 'dzin las byung dam pa'i bde bas gsang bar ni// dkyil 'khor bsams te de nas mthar byed la sogs bsrung byas nas// rang snying bzlas pa'i dam pa'i tsan dan sogs dang me tog 
47a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa phul ti thim// rang dang 'dra ba'i cho gas dbang bskur byas nas 'di ltar nan tan mchod par bya// pad+ma'i nang gi rang gi sa bon 'od kyis drangs nas gzugs thams cad ni// pad+ma'i 'od zer dkyil
47a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor yang dag byang chub yid kyi sa bon bsam par bya// shes rab so so'i ba spu las byung sna tshogs rnam pa'i 'od zer rgyas pa'i tshogs// ma lus khyab pa'i mkha' gzhi thams cad de nas glo dang ldan pas
47a5(rgyud 'grel): spro bar bya// 'od zer sgo nas byung ba'i dri med thams cad rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan sku dang // me long pi wang dri dang ro yi snod dang na bza' chos 'byung la sogs dang // mtshan ma rnams kyi rim pas mdzes
47a6(rgyud 'grel): pas ldem bag phyag ni lo ma 'od dang bcas// gsal ba'i 'od zer sprul pa mang po sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin gyi dra ba rnams 'byung dang // sgyu ma la sogs dra ba'i dngos po so so yang dag rig pa'i 'jig
47a7(rgyud 'grel): rten lta dge dang // rtog pa thams cad nges grol mchog gi bde ba 'byung rgyu'i dngos ldan pa'i// gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis de bzhin phyi ma'i dri sogs thams cad kyis// dbye ba'i rtog pa 
47a8(rgyud 'grel): grol bas rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams la yang dag mchod par bya// oM sarba ti thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// de yi 'og tu sgra brnyan 'dra bar sgra yul thams cad la ni yod bsams na// rang yid rig 
47b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha yi bstod pa'i sgra dang ldan pa'i chos rnams zhes su gsungs// gzugs la sogs pa gcig min rdul phran cha yang ma mthong du ma'i gzugs kyang ma yin zhes pa'ang de bzhin no// yan lag med pa'i
47b2(rgyud 'grel): rdul phran nyid la du ma'i rdul phra rab kyis rjes 'brang med phyir dang // sa yid dkyil 'khor la sogs gzugs kyi dbye bas de la 'ga' yang mi 'gyur ro// de bas 'dzin pa la sogs bral bas rang dbang
47b3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la sogs pa kun brtags ngo bo yin// ma lus g.yo dang mi g.yo'i dngos po dri za'i grong khyer dag dang 'dra ba yin// bdag gir 'dzin pa'i rgyan gyi ngo bos 'khor ba 'di dag ste// dag pa yang ni de las
47b4(rgyud 'grel): ldog pa'i ngo bo tsam la rnam par shes par bya// chos nyid kyis ni srid dang zhi ba'i ngo bo 'dir ni dbye ba 'ga' yang med// ci'i phyir 'dzin pa la sogs rnam par bral ba rtag tu kun la sgrub pa'i phyir// tha mas
